144a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ de la gang spro ba dang / mi snyan par bya ba 'am/ gdang
144b1('bum): phreng brdeg par bya ba gang yang med/ gang gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / brdegs pa dang / 'debs pa de yang med cing mi dmigs so// zhes de ltar brtag par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
144b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs na/ chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dmigs pa
144b3('bum): lta ga la yod de/ des de ltar chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// ci'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya zhe na/ nyon mongs pa mi skye ba dang / ye
144b4('bum): shes mi chod pa'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o// de bzod pa/ de gnyis la genas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// // tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
144b5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
144b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
144b7('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed de/ de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa 'jig
144b8('bum): rten lus 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa de dag yongasu rdzogs
145a1('bum): gnas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/ mngon par zhes pa rnams yang su rdzogs par byed do// lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas tshad med grangs/ 
145a2('bum): med dpag tu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas
145a3('bum): rjes su dran pa mthong ngo // de'i sangs rgyas rje su dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do// de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa 'jig
145a4('bum): rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / thun mong ma yin pa de dag thams cad la gnas nas/ 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa de dag
145a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/ lha'i mig gis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
145a6('bum): nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'des gang ji snyed cig/ bzhugs pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas
145a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob po/ de'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
145a8('bum): rgyun mi 'chad do// de lta'i rna ba mi las 'das pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin to// bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed do// de bzhi
145b1('bum): du nan tan du byas nas/ kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to// de sems can gyi rnam grangs shes pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes so// 
145b2('bum): 'phags pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so// de sems can thams cad kyi sems sems kyis yong su shes par byas shing / 
145b3('bum): de bzhin nyid du chos ston to// sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas/ sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes par byas shing / yang sems can de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to// / 
145b4('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ yang dag par gzeng bskyod do// yang dag par dag par byed do// de zag pa zad pa shes te/ zag pa zad pa shes pa / des sos can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god // 
145b5('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med po dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmig su med pa dang / 'byung ba med
145b6('bum): pa dang / mngon par 'du ba ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
145b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongasu smon par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed do// dri sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
145b8('bum): dag par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'a
146a1('bum): rgya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyis
146a2('bum): 'khor ba las yongasu 'grel to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med
146a3('bum): pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no// rab 'byar ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
146a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed/ pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson
146a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi na zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad
146a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ lus kyi brtson
146a7('bum): 'grus dang / ldan pa yin/ sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan
146a8('bum): gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhag cing rngu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i du ma nyams su myong bar byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du lag pas
146b1('bum): byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyi dbang sbyar te/ de'i lus kyi dbang sgyur te/ de'i lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med
146b2('bum): dpag tu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas pabacom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / 
146b3('bum): zims cha dang sman gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang po de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog/ 
146b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du zad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / gos dang / bsod bsnyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / 
146b5('bum): yo byad mang pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde bar 'gyur ro// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang // ring srel la ring srel gyi mchod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
146b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das de dag gi drung du song zhing chos nyan te/ 'di ji skad du thos pa de yang bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
146b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / sems can rnams kyang yong su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su 'dzin do// rab 'byor de ltar
146b8('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmig su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon
147a1('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thos
147a2('bum): cang mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa/ lam gyi yan lag khongs su chud pa dang ldan
147a3('bum): pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma
147a4('bum): med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ra sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems kyi
147a5('bum): brtson 'grus dang ldan pas lus kyi las mi dge ba'i/ skabs mi 'byed/ ngag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed/ yid kyi la sa mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/ rtag ces bya ba 'am ma rtag ces
147a6('bum): bya ba'am bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am ba 'dag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am dog zhes bya ba 'am mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
147a7('bum): rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs bya zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na/ mtho ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya
147a8('bum): ba 'am zag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par bya ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar snyems pa med do// 'dod pa'i khaMs zhes/ 
147b1('bum): bya ba 'am gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam zag pa dnga' bcas pa'i khams sam/ zag pa med pa'i khams sam/ bsam gtan dang po 'am bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ 
147b2('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa 'am bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod dam/ cung zad med
147b3('bum): pa'i skye mched dam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lung
147b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
147b5('bum): pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
147b6('bum): lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams same/ 
147b7('bum): mtha rad kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa 'am/ smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ 
147b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs la
148a1('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dge zhes bya ba'i
148a2('bum): bya mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'dres pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa med ces bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes
148a3('bum): bya ba'am/ kha na ma thob med ces bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa med ces bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma
148a4('bum): byas zhes bya bar snyems pa med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dra sa bur bsnyems pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu da dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
148a5('bum): chub dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyems pa med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'dang / 
148a6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya bar bsnyems pa med do// sems can 'di dag ni mthong
148a7('bum): bA'i lam gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni bslabs pa'i sas brjod pa/ 'di dag ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni bla ma'i cha can gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyis brjod pa/ 'di dag
148a8('bum): ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis brjod pa zhes bya bar bsnyems pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang gis brjod par
148b1('bum): bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ sems las byung ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon du gyur kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmig so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang
148b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigaso/ sangs rgyas
148b3('bum): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi dmigs so// de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dzin kyang / de la yang chags pa med do// de chags pa med
148b4('bum): phyir sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams nas la/ jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gang dang gis
148b5('bum): rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / tshe 'phrul de dang des rnam par 'phrul te/ me tog gi char dbab pa 'am/ stso/ kyai dad dgyeba'am/ 'brug gi sgra bsdogs pa'am/ klu ral dang / sil snyan
148b6('bum): gyi s+thA bsgrugs pa dang / sa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bstan pa'am/ rin po ches bdun bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bstan pas/ rnam par 'phel te// gang dang gang dugang dang gang sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de
148b7('bum): rnams sa kyang da ba shA bdag pos / ga' ga yad pa'i ba gyur ra brjod/ ga mang cam pa
148b8('bum): yin panam nyid / srog gtsad pa las bzlon no// masbyin par len pa dang / 'di pas log par gsem pa dang / pras sgra dang / zhog da pa'i tshig dang / rdzun du m+b+ha tshig kya
149a1('bum): dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba las yongs su 'grel te// la la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so// la la la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dog so/ la la'i don du ni yan
149a2('bum): lag dang / nyid lag yongasu gtong ngo / la la'i don du ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo / la la'i don du ni rgyal srong yongs su tong ngo // de ltar thangs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i
149a3('bum): thabs des kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chi/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed
149a4('bum): pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ brtso nu 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
149a5('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtsha/ na ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigasu med pa
149a6('bum): dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
149a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa
149a8('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma rtogs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de 'dod pas dben
149b1('bum): sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyi/ 
149b2('bum): dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang
149b3('bum): ldan pa'i sems ni/ 'jig rten gyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas rdugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de nas na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung
149b4('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa de la gnas shing / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la
149b5('bum): lugs dang ma thun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms pa/ ra 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo // mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 
149b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin lang nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// klog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag
149b7('bum): pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rdorje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi pha rol tudu phyin pa 'dil gnas nas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam
149b8('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad de khongs su chud par byas shing / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o// dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/ rigs kyis
150a1('bum): dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byams pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o// rang sangs
150a2('bum): rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// des de dag la spyod
150a3('bum): cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du/ 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pa sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa
150a4('bum): byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba ste/ sangs/ nga rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed
150a5('bum): do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
150a6('bum): ba bskyed par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de la sems can la la ni sbyin pa yis yongs
150a7('bum): snad do// la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do/ la la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do// la la ni shes rab kyis yongasu sdud do// la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su sdud do// 
150a8('bum): me la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do// la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i'o 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go// la ni cig phyir 'ong ba'i blas bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
150b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go// la la ni rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go// de de ltar gang dang gang gis sems can
150b2('bum): rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de de la sbyor te/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrub po/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob po/ 
150b3('bum): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te/ de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nam yang 'dod pa la sten par mi 'gyur ro// 
150b4('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa yang gang yang med do// skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgyu maH
150b5('bum): bu'i chos thams cad rab mthong / rab tu rig rab tu rtogs pa 'o sa na/ de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing / sem/ nyes can rnams kyi don byed do// des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du
150b6('bum): byed thams cad rab tu rig pas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te/ kye ma sems cad 'di dag ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i la 'khor ba sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar gyurari pa yin na/ 
150b7('bum): bdag gis 'di dag ni zhig na/ sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skyes te/ de la yang sems can rnamasems can du gdags
150b8('bum): bar dmig su med de/ des thams cad ma dmigs na/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ dmig su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams la 'god de/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ting nge 'dzin
151a1('bum): gyil ro lang tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par sarang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par
151a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam du yang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha ro lang du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
151a3('bum): kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubabs te/ de la gnas pas/ bag tshogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas
151a4('bum): bdag gi don kyang byed gzhan gyi don kyang byed de/ des pang dag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas/ lho dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rim 'gro'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rab
151a5('bum): 'byorang de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad ma tshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigasu
151a6('bum): med pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
151a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du
151a8('bum): bya ba med pa lo mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
151b1('bum): lo bang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems dang po ba skyed pa nas/ 
151b2('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems yang dag pa 'am/ yongasu grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de/ gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongasu grub pa yang dag par rjesasu
151b3('bum): mi mthong ngo // cho ra ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang / yongasu grub pa
151b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 2 du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang / yongasu grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ gzugs kyi skye bas
151b5('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du da dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / tsher
151b6('bum): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ des gzugs kyi skye ba'i tshogs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
151b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yang dag pa dang
151b8('bum): yongasu grub pa yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ste/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ra gyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'o sgo ya
152a1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rje su ma mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rje sum mthong ste/ gsog nyid dang / 
152a2('bum): gas pa nyid du yang dag par rjesum mthong ngo // de de ltar rtogs pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs// rnam pa thams cad
152a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin mi dmigaso// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed de/ de de ltar rtogs par byed cing / nang spong pa nyid
152a4('bum): la spyod cing phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dngam
152a5('bum): rnam par shes pa 'am/ skye mched dam/ khams sam/ rten cing // 'brel par 'byung ba 'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams som/ stong pa nyid thams cad dam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ 
152a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mtha rad kyis gnas
152a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin
152a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ bla na
152b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su
152b2('bum): rdzogs par byed de/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad
152b3('bum): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
152b4('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung das kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so/ yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
152b5('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe'abyad bzang po brgyad bcu yongasu 'dzind to// de byang chub kyi
152b6('bum): lam rnam pa ra ta sbyin pa'i chos can la gnas sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ 
152b7('bum): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed gyu rad nas/ sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so// gang la tshul
152b8('bum): khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba dag la yang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so// gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang bzod pas phan 'dogs so// gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdag
153a1('bum): par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so// gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis pan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang ting nge 'dzin gyis pan 'dogs so// gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de
153a2('bum): ngag la yang nga shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so// gang la rnam par grol bas pan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang / rnam par grol bas pan 'dogs so// gangal rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas pan
153a3('bum): gdags par bya ba de dag la yang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas na 'dogs so// gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang
153a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi'o// dang ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa ya du dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa
153a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do// de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/ de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi
153a6('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par bsgrubs te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / 'jug rten gyi khams nas/ 'jig rten gyi
153a7('bum): khas su 'gros des 'jig rten gyi las de dag mthong nas/ ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ 'di ltar dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi long spyod dang / snying pa lta bu dag dang / 
153a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang bral ba dag na/ long spyod dang skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa der 'byung ste/ de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
153b1('bum): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi phar lang tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par/ 
153b2('bum): shes pa rnams dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam desalam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su zab
153b3('bum): ste/ gal te ci tsam du gzugs yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'a
153b4('bum): byung ba yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zagad pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 
153b5('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su gzung ba med/ pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa ra rdza gas par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
153b6('bum): long spyod dang / skyid pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongasu gzung du med pa ste/ chos thams cad yongasu
153b7('bum): gzung du med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos stond do// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan
153b8('bum): ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na
154a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang
154a2('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// / 
154a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug bcu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang
154a4('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing / mtshan ma mchis pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid lags na/ ji/ de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
154a5('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod// pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154a6('bum): phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ zag pa med pa 'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa
154a7('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
154a8('bum): pa 'dus pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du 'dus pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid ma mchis par
154b1('bum): mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga 'di la
154b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // tshul khrims bsrung ngo // bzod pa
154b3('bum): skom mo/ brtson 'grus brtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgrom mo// shes rab skam mo/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / smrig rgyu la bu dang / cu zla lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri zla'i
154b4('bum): grong khyer la bu dang / sgrub pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po/ lnga la gnas shing / smid pa yong su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa snyam mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mi/ ting nge 'dzin snyam mo/ 
154b5('bum): rab sgom mo// de 'di ltar rtog ste/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung ba lnga ni/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / smrig rgyu la bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / mig yor
154b6('bum): bu dang / smra brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / mtshan nyid med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zho ni/ rmi lam la rang bzhin gong yang med do// sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bu
154b7('bum): dang chu ba zla lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid mod de/ gang la mtshan
154b8('bum): nyid med pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// zhes bya bar rtogs par byedade// rab 'byo rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par byaste/ sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// tong ba ni man+ta/ 
155a1('bum): nyi da med pa'o// len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/ de de ltar shes nas/ sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa yin/ te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
155a2('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
155a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// tshad med pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// gzung gis med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
155a4('bum): ba bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ 9/ yong su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi// dad pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
155a5('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu rdzu gas par byed do// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yong su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid thams cad dang / 
155a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de
155a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de 'phags
155a8('bum): pa'i chos rnam par byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnas la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad me chad grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas
155b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spyan gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/ longs spyod dang / skyid pa thas cad
155b2('bum): kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byid // de na sems can gang skyid pas yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongasu srung ngo // gang tshul khrims kyis yongasu srung ba dag dang / gang bzod pas yongasu bsdu po de dag dang / gang brtson
155b3('bum): 'grus kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag dang / gang la bsam gtan gyis yong su bsdu ba dag dang / gang shos rab kyis song su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongasu bsdud do// gang rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yong/ 
155b4('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongasu sdud do// de ltar gang gis dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongasu sdud do// dge ba'i chos
155b5('bum): de dag dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/ de banye bar len kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/ de sems / rten rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/ 
155b6('bum): phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis/ sos can rnams yongasu srung ngo // de thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnaso// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bris bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ni
155b7('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas// rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos bas cad shes par byas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 
155b8('bum): thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i shes pas/ pha rol
157a1('bum): tu phyin pa drug mtshan nyid med par shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan nyid med par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha lang
157a2('bum): tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sbrum lta bu dang / smrig rgyul bu dang / chu bzlal bu dang / mig g.yor lta bu dang / sna brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong
157a3('bum): khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i
157a4('bum): phung po lnga rmi lam lci bur shes/ sbrum la bu dang / smyig rgyudabu dang / chu zla lA bu dang / mig yo lce bu dang / sgra banan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shas
157a5('bum): nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/ mni ga pa/ ma ral ba/ skyon med pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ nyams pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa// 
157a6('bum): 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa med pa lam gyi khongs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de/ de la granas shing / yang dag pa'i blang ba'i brda' dang / ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / 
157a7('bum): chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi spyad pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ngo // de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang
157a8('bum): ra 'dis rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar
157b1('bum): zhe'am/ rgyal phran nam/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / skal pa mnyam par skye'o zhe'am/ sum bcu
157b2('bum): rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan nam/ 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
157b3('bum): bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'bris bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des skems pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
157b4('bum): chos thos cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i
157b5('bum): chos kyis kyang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
157b6('bum): tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yong su rdzogs par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med para'ajug pa'i tshe/ mi ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ le gyi rnam
157b7('bum): ba shes pa nyid pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/ gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/ 
157b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang yongasasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu 'dzin to// de 'gro ba
158a1('bum): lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang 'khor ba'i rnam par smin pa pas gos par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba byed kyang / de la sdod pa 'am
158a2('bum): 'o ba 'am/ song pa'am 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba yang mi dmigs te/ sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed/ sems can dang sems can du gdags par mi dmigs so// 
158a3('bum): shes rab / bam por// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med
158a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyi das kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang / gang bla na med pa yang dag
158a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems sa dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs na/ des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas/ sprul pas sprul pa mdzad de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
158a6('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// rab 'byor de de ltar sprul pa bskal pa gcig lon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
158a7('bum): chub tu lung bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 
158a8('bum): dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / sems can nam/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs la/ sems can rnams kyi
158b1('bum): don kyang byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
158b2('bum): de yongs su rdzogs pas/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad yongs su chud par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam
158b3('bum): lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
158b4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la ga nas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed
158b5('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyams su
158b6('bum): len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos khongs su chud pa'i bzod pa'o// // de gnyis su med pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa'
158b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing / gshe' ba 'am/ mi snyan par brjod cing / ma klas pa'i tshig brlang ba zer bar gyurd tam/ rdo dbyug dang / mtshon chas 'debs
158b8('bum): sam/ btab kyang de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems
159a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod par mi bya ste/ phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag na/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis man rang ba ste/ 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi bskyed
159a2('bum): spya 'an man tad rgyam zung ba dgar gyur pa 'di blangs pas// len zhes bdag lhag par stong rje bskyed par byar/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje bar gyur nas/ rnam pa de ltar rtog pa don nyims su len pa'i brjed
159a3('bum): zhes d+h+ya ra/ dam chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems can de dag kyang / don dam par dmigs su medan/ bdag la gshe 'a ba'am/ oM snyan par brjod pa 'am/ maklas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba'o/ 
159a4('bum): rjodabyug gis brjog cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod do/ 'du byed thams cad ni spyam lta bu/ gsog gsob rag las pa/ nam kha' lta bu bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 
159a5('bum): 'gro ba dang / gso' ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed ce na dang / shed bdag dang / bral ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yo sa su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/ bdag la gshe' ba
159a6('bum): 'am/ m-i sman par brjod pa dang / maklas pa'i tshig brlang bzer ba dang / rdo dbyug gis rdeg cing 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/ bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ de ltar
159a7('bum): sa pa dog byang mo bya'o/ zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chos long rung pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/ dede ltar yongs su rtog cing bzod pa'i pharol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa yongasu
159b1('bum): rdzogs pa ngos mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// rab 'byorard kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de spang ba ni ji mchis/ ye shes ni ci mchis// bcom ldan
159b2('bum): 'angs kyis bka' suyang ba/ rab 'byor chos gang lo yang rdul tsam yong skye ba med pa de ni mo skye ba'o// de gang gis mi skye ba 'di ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// gsol dpa/ 
159b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang legs pa'i bzod pa de dag la
159b4('bum): bye brag tu bgro ba ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byorang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
159b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong / ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub semasas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// phyir mi
159b6('bum): 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / song ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
159b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor da de ni nyan thos dang / 
160a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ 
160a2('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye bo'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam
160a3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed de/ de yong su rdzogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
160a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de mngon par shes pa lnga dang ma bral ba yin/ da mngon par shes pa rnam ngas dang mi 'bral bas/ sems can rnams yongasu
160a5('bum): smin par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas pa yin/ de sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas pa/ te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byas nas
160a6('bum): skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
160a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
160a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len
160b1('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de la lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs te/ phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad kyi 'jig
160b2('bum): rten gyi khams ngag tu song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed do// de lus kyi brtson
160b3('bum): des sems can rnams yong su smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byord de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
160b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de rnams kyi brtson 'grus 8 zag pa med pa/ lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa lam
160b5('bum): gyi khongasu chud pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phi len pa gong du/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang
160b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam
160b7('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin
160b8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasu
161a1('bum): sa pa ma rdzogs par byed de/ de la sgyu ga rgyu na sa pa ya nga na do pa rdzog pa da/ sa su rdzogs bya skye
161a2('bum): kye mas sto kyim nyon mongs pa thams pa spangs par 'gyur ro// pag tshogs kyi rnams sbyor thams cad ngas nas// thun su tshigs pa sa su rdzogs da // kun du snang khyob ca byas nas
161a3('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba bskor bar bya'o// de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / rab tu g.yos dang / kun nas
161a4('bum): g.yol ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun nas 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun nas ldeg par 'gyur je/ steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 
161a5('bum): thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro// / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus de ni/ gang du 'byung zhing dbyangs snyan par gyur pa'i sgra
161a6('bum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi se rnams can gang ji snyed kyis/ thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dade ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ byang
161a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas
161a8('bum): kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
161b1('bum): ma spyod pa'i rmi/ mrings sna bu'i shi bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig songs bu / spyas sa bru dang / sdig rgyul zu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nyi bar men pa'i thung po lngal gnas shi
161b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rolang tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung
161b3('bum): po lnga la gnas nas sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs
161b4('bum): par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems pa pa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gautan gsum pa dang / 
161b5('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la dang
161b6('bum): rnam shes mtha' las skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
161b7('bum): sbom mo/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skam la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma rtogs par/ nyan thos sam thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang
161b8('bum): ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin de
162a1('bum): ngag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myang bar yang mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid med pa dang / dngos po med
162a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du shes pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i chos kyang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/ de ro myang bar byed pa
162a3('bum): med pas pa ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam gzugs med pa'i kham su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang mi dmigs/ gang snyoms par
162a4('bum): 'jug pa dang / gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de yang mi dmig so// de mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan
162a5('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongasu 'da'o// rab 'byod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems da 'a sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162a6('bum): yongasu rdzogs par bgyis shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pararab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162a7('bum): chen pos nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid 'di dag la rgyun tu zhugs
162a8('bum): pa'i 'bras zhu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid deme/ rang byang chub bam/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/ 
162b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongasu shin tu 'das
162b2('bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan
162b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no// mi dmigs pa thams cad ni skyon med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
162b4('bum): dmigs pa ni gang lags/ mi dmigs pa ni gang lag/ sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gzugs/ ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs
162b5('bum): la'o// rab 'byor da tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// mig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
162b6('bum): chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// mig gi rnam
162b7('bum): par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// rdo rje dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ga
162b8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// so'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs
163a1('bum): pa'o// ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye ma ched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / 
163a2('bum): ni dmigs pa'o// pha rolang tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang // tshad med pa
163a3('bum): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
163a4('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnam das dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bani/ 
163a5('bum): dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni dmigs pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dmigs pa ste skyon no// rab 'byor
163a6('bum): skyon med pa ni gang la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
163a7('bum): thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
163a8('bum): ba rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rjes dang / 
163b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
163b2('bum): pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / chos de dag gi brjod pa yang dmigasu me do 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin med
163b3('bum): pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin med/ gang la
163b4('bum): rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos/ rnams la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod
163b5('bum): du med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsagatan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa re 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
163b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin
163b7('bum): med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
163b8('bum): bco brgyad la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub
164a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
164a2('bum): byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gyis mi sbyin/ 'dod chags sam zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gis skye bar 'gyur zhing de la gnas te/ de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / las de mngon
164a3('bum): thor 'dus byas pas 'khor ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba sti ci smos te de ni gnas med do// gnan du na sgyu ma lta blo'i chos rnams la gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/ sems
164a4('bum): can rnams sgyu ma yang dmigs pa med do// de sems can rnams sgyu ma yang dmigs pa med do// de sems can sgyu ma mi dmigs pas sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
164a5('bum): 'dzin te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin// kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byas nas te
164a6('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/ mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
164a7('bum): sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi po ri lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rmi la lta bur yong su shes// chos thams cad sgra brnyan la bu dang / mig sor sna byu dang / sgyu ma lta bu ngong / smig rgyu
164a8('bum): dang / sbrul ba lta buram su shes sa// gso ladas mam ldan 'as de stir na byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po zhes kyi rol tu byin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ de sti na chos thams ca rnaM
164a9('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yong su 'tshal ba lags// ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
164b1('bum): phyu mo su 'tshal 'a lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dis byung chub sems dbu' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 'o yang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rmi lam mi man
164b2('bum): rmi lam ma thong ba mi mthong / sgra brnyan mo thos so// sku banan nyin pa ma thos so// mig sor mi mthong ngo // mag sor mthong ba mi mthong ngo // sgyu ma mi mthong ngo // sbrum mthong ba mi mthong ngo// smug+sa/ 
164b3('bum): skyem mthong ga sdigs rnam mi mang ngo // sbrul pa mo mthong / sbrul bu mdzo na mi mthong ba mi mthod // de ci'i phyi na/ 'a thom mas pa'i b+hU brnam 'i rnam pa ni sbyin gyi chog
164b4('bum): pyod ni byin gyi lag go/ sbrum ni byin gyi lag go// hU~M/ rgyun byin ci log go// sprul pa ni phyin ci log gi// dgra bcom rmim sa mi maH dza / rmims mthong ba myi mtho
164b5('bum): mthong dzin sgo brnyan ma thos so// sgra brnyan nyan pa mi thasamig yor mi mthong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyis mig yor mthong ba mi mthong / sgyu ma mi mthong ngo // sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo // smyig rgyu
164b6('bum): mi mthong / smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo / sprul pa mi mthong ngo // sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
164b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rmi lam mi gzigs// rmilam mthong ba mi gzigs so// sgra brnyan mi gsan to// sgra brnyan nyan pa mi gzigs so// mig yor mi gzigs so// mig yor mthong ba mi
164b8('bum): gzigs so// sgyu ma mi gzigs so// sgyu mthong ba mi gzigs so// smig rgyu mi gzigs so// smig rgyu mthong ba mi gzigs so// sprul pa mi gzigs so// sprul pa mthong ba mi gzigs so// 
165a1('bum): 'i phyir de na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa ste/ yang dag bla ma yin pa'i phyir/ chos/ 
165a2('bum): thams cad yo su grub pa med na de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po'i 'du shes sam/ yongasu grub pa'i 'du shes sam/ yang
165a3('bum): dag pa'i 'du gas 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhen// gal te chos la la zhig gso bro nying dam/ yongasu grub pa 'am/ yang dag par gyur pa zhig dmigs na ni/ 
165a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems nga dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ nga gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes rang / 
165a5('bum): 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams dang // skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la chags pa med do// 'dod pa 'i khams la chags pa med do// gzugs kyi khams
165a6('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i khamasu chags pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
165a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa medado// nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
165a8('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdan la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam rten rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnaMs dang / 
165b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa medan/ 
165b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa
165b3('bum): med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sa dang po yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir/ 
165b4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/ de la 'dod pa/ 'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ le gnas shing / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang
165b5('bum): sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa dang / yong su rdzogs par byed rje de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
165b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/ de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par ga la 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so// de mi
165b7('bum): dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams cad 'dus par mthong ste/ chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos
165b8('bum): de dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyi su med de gnyisu byar med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang med de/ chos kyi dbyingasu bston pa dang / de bzhin nyid
166a1('bum): sa ga/ sa pa da sa / sa mas ca bye mam / she ma/ 
166a2('bum): ma rnams bstad pa lags/ sna sa rten pa dang / 'jig de mas 'das pa'i sa rnams brtan pa legs/ ji ltar bag pa dang brnas pa dag / lag pa med pa'i rnas rnams parnas
166a3('bum): lags// ji ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la
166a4('bum): 'dus byas sam/ 'dus mi byas sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ sems gang
166a5('bum): yang brjod du yong dam/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dade bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs nges na/ de ltar chos thams
166a6('bum): thams cad byi me ba dang / chos thams cad san rnaM ma da pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'azung ba med par rig par bya'o// rang dang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba skyed de'i tshe/ gzugs
166a7('bum): 'a// banas byaba'am/ 'dugs zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dugyu cis d+hAd+hA la/ rnam pa shes pa shes byab sa/ snro d+h+we ces pa ba nga/ sa dang / rlos pa ma zung 'o
166b1('bum): kha chos rnams zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rmer ba dang / lag rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang thun mong / 
166b2('bum): thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'am/ rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir bong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / nga/ 
166b3('bum): bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba'i chos gang gi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dede ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
166b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ blan med pa yang dag/ na par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
166b5('bum): chos thams cad kyi ring bzhin la mkhas par bya'o// byang pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mas pa ni/ byang chub kyi lam yongasu rdzogs par byed do// sems
166b6('bum): can rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su 'dzin to// de la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams ci nas
166b7('bum): kyang dul bar gyur nas/ srid po gsum na mi sdang ba de ltar rnam par btul lo// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166b8('bum): wa bu slob par bya'o// / shes rab kyi phar yang tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga po las/ le'u drug cu gcig pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'ongs
167a1('bum): ga / 'di skad ces gsoyo to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyil ma lta bu'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nying rang gi myatshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la/ 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i
167a2('bum): chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// bad dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 
167a3('bum): 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
167a4('bum): pa mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod
167a5('bum): bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
167a6('bum): thams cad la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
167a7('bum): 'di dag ni zag med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus pa byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rgyun skur zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyul 'gyuraro// 'di dag ni rgyulan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
167a8('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa'o// 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur/ 
167b1('bum): zhesuM bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byis pa so so'i spyi don rmi lam yang dmigs pa/ rmi lam mthong ba yang dmigs so/ 
167b2('bum): sgra brnyan yang dmigs la/ sgra brnyan nyan pa yang dmigs so// mig yor yang dmigs la/ mig yor mthong ba yang dmigs la/ sgyu ma yang dmigs la/ sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmigaso
167b3('bum): smig rgyu yang dmigs la/ smig rgyu mthong ba yang dmyig so// sprul pa yang dmigs la/ sprul pa mthong ba yang dmigs so// des rmi lam yang dmigs/ rmi lam mthong ba yang dmigs
167b4('bum): sprul pa'i bar yang dmigs/ sprul pa mthong ba yang ngami// gas nas/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang ma/ dngon par 'du byed do// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi
167b5('bum): dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do// lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo' ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do// de bas na
167b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid la gnas shing / sems can rjes
167b7('bum): la chos ston te/ khams gsum 'di ni stong pa ste/ 'di la gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am// skye mched rnams sam/ khams rnams med do/ 'di
167b8('bum): ni rmi lam/ 'di ni sgra brnyan/ 'di ni mig yor/ 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'di ni sprul pa ste/ 'di la phung po rnams so// skye mched rnaMs sam/ khams med do// 'di la rmi lam med do// 
168a1('bum): rmi lam mthong ba med do// sgra brnyan med do// sgra brnyan nyan pa med do// mig yor med do// mig yor mthong ba med do// sgyu ma med do// sgyu ma mthong ba med do// smyig rgyu med do// smig rgyu mthong ba me/ 
168a2('bum): sprul pa med do// sprul pa mthong ba med do// chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ 'on kyang khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes pa/ skye mched med pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa
168a3('bum): khams med pa la kham su 'du shes pa dag ste/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skye ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa las yongasu bzung ba yin no/ khyed rnams ci'i
168a4('bum): phyir chos thams cad la dngos po med pa la dngos po'i 'du shesu byed ces ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can
168a5('bum): saur sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la sbyar te/ sbyin pa yongasu btang ba de yang // de dag la long spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// des de dag la
168a6('bum): bskyod na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs po de yang de dag la mtho' ri sa skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// de dag las bskyod nas ting nge 'dzin las sbyor te
168a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// des de dag las bskyod nas/ bsam rten dang po la sbyor te/ bsam gtan dang po las/ bsam gtan gnyis pa/ bsam
168a8('bum): gtan gnyis pa las/ bsam gtan gsum pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa las/ bsam gtan bzhi pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
168b1('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched
168b2('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro// des sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dam pa de las
168b3('bum): rnam grangs dums bstod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyi su dbugs 'byin to// gzhog go rab tu 'god do// ngas tshul khrims dang // tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs dums bskyed de/ 
168b4('bum): byung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su rab tu ga zhog go// des ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu de las rnamadagrangs dum su bskyod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ 
168b5('bum): hU~M su rab tu gnog go// dran pa nye bar gzhog pa ba da yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga / stobs lnga dong / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
