168b6('bum): pa lam na lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa parjid d+hA/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum da / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mab+had kyis gnas pa'i snangs par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon pa shes pa
168b7('bum): ga 'dzin rnams dang / gzus kyi na rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa ban+d+ha / sa pa da yang rgyu / snrus na / skye chen po dang
168b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par ston to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzeng stong ngo // yang dag par dga' bar byed do// 'dul lo gzhog/ rab tu 'god do// de zag pa med pa'i chos gzug
170a1('bum): med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ de dag gis gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god ngo do// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ 
170a2('bum): don du gnyer ba de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god/ 
170a3('bum): gang phyir dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'gong ngo do// gang rang byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du/ 
170a4('bum): gnyer ba de dag la lam brjod cing ston to// yang dag par ston to/ yang dag par skal lo/ yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' phar byed do// 'dul lo gzhog go/ rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor da de ltar/ 
170a5('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgo brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smrig
170a6('bum): rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rnam par dgod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom
170a7('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i che/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo
170a8('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos/ 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos
170b1('bum): ga rte pa'i chos so// dag nga ga rten sungs mas/ 'di ga lanam tho ba sa mas pa/ 'di dag ni lan mtho ba dang sa pa mas// 'di dag ni zag pa dang / 
170b2('bum): sa pa'i rnaMs/ dag ni zag pa med pa'i rnas pa/ 'di dag ni lus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag na 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras su mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur b.ro// 'das
170b3('bum): ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
170b4('bum): byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par bgyid pa de ni ngo mtshar te rmad du byung ba'i chos so// de skad ces gso ra lod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad
170b5('bum): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byorang de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra / pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad
170b6('bum): ngom po med pa'i ngobo nyid dang / chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid lnga 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
170b7('bum): chos sa/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chas so// 'di dag ni ldanas zla ba dang banas rdzas ma/ di dag myi la nA ma tho ba med pa'i chos/ 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos/ 'di dag ni lA
170b8('bum): phyir nga ba'i chos tsu khu dang / phyong ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa 'di mngan du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i// 'di dag ni phrin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi
171a1('bum): kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// zhes bya bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur ba de ni ngo mtshur te/ rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ngo mtshar man
171a2('bum): kyi chos de shes kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la slar phan btags par bya ba slob ma yin te/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sos/ 
171a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zil kyis gnan par mi nus so// rab 'byord kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar gyi chos byang chub sems
171a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mchis pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig ngas bshad par bya'o// rab 'byorang 'di la
171a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i da ro la tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rnam par smin pa las sbyong ba'i ste
171a6('bum): kha nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan pa zhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
171a7('bum): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgyu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
171a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa phan dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
171b1('bum): bcwo brgyad la gnas shing // phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song zhing / sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la
171b2('bum): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / 
171b3('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan bzhi pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
171b4('bum): par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms/ par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
171b5('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag le ni/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la byams pas phan gdags par bya ba/ 
171b6('bum): de dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni btang snyoms kyis phran 'dogs so// sems can gang dran pa
171b7('bum): nyebar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan log bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag
171b8('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rga dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par she/ 
172a1('bum): pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad/ 
172a2('bum): dang / snying rje chen pos phan 'dogs par bya ba de dag la ni snying rjes phan 'dogs so// gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis/ phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
172a3('bum): kyis phan 'dogs so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags/ bcom ldan
172a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom
172a5('bum): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnam/ nyes la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnaMs la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la/ byug pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ mal cha 'dod
172a6('bum): pa rnams la mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas mi'i yo byad 'dod pa la mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongasu rtong ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
172a7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul zhing yongasu rtog pa dang / ji ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir ma ring ba rnaMs dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnas
172a8('bum): dang / yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongasu rtong pa de bzhin du mir gyur pa rnams dang / de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnasu rtogs pa'i sems can thos cad la yang tha dod du
172b1('bum): bya ba med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhog cing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med pa ste/ des tha dad du bya ba med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas// tha dad du bya ba med pa'i
172b2('bum): chos 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin
172b3('bum): nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te byol song gi skye gnas su rtogs pa ma yin no snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
172b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di ltar ba de dag gis sems can 'di dag la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o// 'di dag/ de la ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya bar bla na med pa
172b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ma mi na te// de dag sbyin pas pa na gdags nas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba'irigasu skye bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rig su skye
172b6('bum): khyim bdag tshe zhing mtho' ba'i rig su skye bar 'gyur te/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan gdags po de dag/ theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'ongs pa'i dbying su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
172b7('bum): gyis te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye ba'i tshigs thams cad kyis gsad par gsol pa btab na/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen pos sbyin no snyam 'o ma/ mi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems
172b8('bum): gzhung pa skyeng dur mi bya'o/ 'jug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye ba'i tshigs de dag pa sbyin par bya/ rdeng sa phyi zhen/ 'di ster do ni sems can thams cad kyi dang shung bla ming ba yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang du
173a1('bum): hU~M rnams / hU~M dang / A dus pa na gyi swA la ga ga nasas kyi gnags shes 9/ sa myal dang/ 
173a2('bum): gnyen gyis zhig ces sus gsol ba bdab ces smon par 'gyur ro// ra'i 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drung du mir gyur pa'am/ si ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs nas bdag ni
173a3('bum): slos mo po'o// zhes yan lag dang nying lag gcad par gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe des sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173a4('bum): po de sems can rnams kyi don gyi ched du bsams te/ lus 'dis bdag gi so sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o// zhes lus yongasu pa dezung bas na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag
173a5('bum): gi don tu lus yongasu gzung bas/ de dag bslang mi dgos parakhyer zhing deng shig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
173a6('bum): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo pa mthong na/ 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmig su med na/ 'di la su zhig sbyin pa
173b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o// de stong pa nyid la gnas shing sbyin pa gtong na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yo
173b2('bum): su rdzogs pa des/ phyi nang gi dngos po bcad cing btubs kyang bdag la su yang rtsub bam gcad do// snyam pa'i sems mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na
173b3('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba che/ 
173b4('bum): po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongasu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phru/ la gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
173b5('bum): de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can de myal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas ste/ yongs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems
173b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173b7('bum): po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes
173b8('bum): nyim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'din sa sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten pa rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang nu dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang lho nub dang / nub
174a1('bum): dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems
174a2('bum): can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongasu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
174a3('bum): de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal po chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas/ yongasu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can rnams la chos bstan
174a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / snying rje chen po drang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston to// des sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
174a5('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba// chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba che/ nyen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang // 
174a6('bum): skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sde ga bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs skye sa kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na
174a7('bum): shang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byem steng dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos sangs rgyas kyicom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong
174a8('bum): ste byang chu sems 'a sems dpa chen po dag ga rgya sa com ldan ngas ga sa su rgyas nas spyan las ga tu gas par mi 'gyur bas ma ngon gyi gas par 'gyur ba dang / tsug su ma byonangs
174b1('bum): yin gyi thug su byod pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus pas shin tu dadapas bsnyem bkur byed cing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ 
174b2('bum): chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing / nam du yang chud mi za'o// rab 'byor dngas 'di nyid nas/ 
174b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
174b4('bum): gang ga klung gi bye mo snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' semades dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bste/ chen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
174b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das de dang / la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ dgos par 'gyur ba dang / thu gsu mi byon pas ma yin gyi thug su byon pa dang / dam gas
174b6('bum): bam ma yin gyi/ gus pas shin du dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gos chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung na sod
174b7('bum): blan med pa 'a dag par rdzogs pa nga na tu mngon par rdzogs pa sa sa rgyas du 'ang nang nam dus rlu chus // shes kyi / 
174b8('bum): 'khyo ngas kyang 'dings sa ma rgyas kyi sbyid gyis 'dig tan la rnam pa rdzogs / gang byin kyi garten gyi thas pang krung kyi khyim stong gan/ byang chu mams dpa' semam
176a1('bum): dang skyos song gyi ste gsu pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongasu spyong bar byed cing / des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang bcad cing 'atubs te/ phyogs
176a2('bum): thucun rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dopa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

176a6('bum): ngan las 'dres pa'i dab su rim gyis yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sesadapa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
176a7('bum): bya rgya tu mas paskyed cing// de bzhin nyid donan tan byed pa de dag ni nga pan pa meng pa byed pa'o// 'byur mye rnaMs sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis lngag rten me rnam par gzigs na/ dz+ha
176a8('bum): rlung / byang / bya ga dang / gang myo nga / mu dang / nub pa nga/ ga dang / snying ga phyogs kyi jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi khyim snyed dgan/ byang chub sems
176b1('bum): chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongasu rtong par byed cing de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing btubs te/ 
176b2('bum): phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnasu rtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nisha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems

176b5('bum): thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi thog pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gos phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu rim
176b6('bum): gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bu mdzong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shAn med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin dun ma tan
176b7('bum): ba de dag ni dri ltar phan pa nang po byed // rad 'byor dus 'donas songs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten gyi rngam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byem skyeng dug bya / 
176b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi ngogs kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi lags kyi yul de dag na/ sdug sngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / sem sna spang ba'i phyir chos
177a1('bum): ston pa dang / de dag na sas can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas ni
177a2('bum): par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po mo lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu ma
177a3('bum): nga ni las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ni/ 
177a4('bum): lhoHdang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / sher lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kha rnams gang ga'i klong gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
177a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed yod du/ de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir/ 
177a6('bum): chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag le byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba
177a7('bum): dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po mo lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das
177a8('bum): kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ni/ shar phyogs
177b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang /

177b3('bum): gsum pos rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
177b4('bum): shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhil med khang de dag 'ab ra bar snang por byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag
177b5('bum): g+ha/ 'du byod thams cad ni sdug bsngal bya/ 'du byed tha/ sa cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed Thas cad ni mi brtan pa 'du byad thams cad ni ling brtan du mi ru/ 
178a1('bum): 9/ lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs ma ngan las 'das par gyur
178a2('bum): pa dang yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas/ shas ches mos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang ba byas/ 
178a3('bum): shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 
178a4('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
178a5('bum): kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs no// shar phyoganas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub se rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs
178a6('bum): por lce la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ji zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsob dang / gsog/ sha stag la ci zhig lte bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa
178a7('bum): de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ni ngo mtshar

178b1('bum): nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

178b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu po'i dngos po ba nis sdung ba mthong ste/ ba ni gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyang pa dang / don mthun pa dang / rab 'byor nga ji ltar na byang chub
179a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis snang ba mthong ste// bzhig shen/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyang pa dang / don mthun pa dang / rab 'byor
179a2('bum): lan byang chu sems papa' sems dpa chen gyi sbyin pas de ldan rnams snang ba yin nen/ sno lta na gyi chub sems tha~M sems dpa'i rkyen gi sbyi pas gnyis sa

179a6('bum): pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po yongasu gtong na 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bsrang mi dgos par khyer cig/ long la dong shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa
179a7('bum): des sbyin pa byin nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabasu rtong ngo // chos la skyabasu gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabasu gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabasu gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'jud do// la la ni
179a8('bum): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la/ la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la/ la la
179b1('bum): ni bsam gtan gsum pa la/ la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la rab tu 'god do// la la ni byams pa la/ la la ni snying rje la/ la la ni dga' ba la/ la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la
179b2('bum): ninam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/ la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/ la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la/ la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do// 
179b3('bum): la la ni sangs rgyas rje su dran pa la/ la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la/ la la ni dge 'dun rjesu ngan pa la/ la la ni tshul khrims rje su dran pa la/ la la ni rtong brje su dran pa la/ la la ni lha rje su dran
179b4('bum): pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lus la mi rtsang pa la sogs pa la 'du shes so sor brtag pa la/ la la ni rnam par da dag pa la yang dag par skul la/ la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
179b5('bum): pa bzhi la/ la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la/ la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la/ la la ni dbang po lnga la/ la la ni stobs lnga la/ la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/ la
179b6('bum): ya ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/ la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la/ la la ni
179b7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la la li ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la/ rdul la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la/ la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skal lo// 
179b8('bum): la la ni byams pa chen po la/ la la ni dpe' byad bzang po la/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs
180a1('bum): ga rugrub par bya ba la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/ la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
180a2('bum): 'bras bu la na ka la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/ la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skal la/ la laM ni byang chub la/ la la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
180a3('bum): nyid la/ la la ni rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
180a4('bum): can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongasu rtong zhing / thabs mkhas pa'i bla ni med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems daHradapa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtsha ro rmad du byung ba'i chos
180a5('bum): rab 'byor dede ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ 
180a6('bum): rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten po'i chos rnams
180a7('bum): brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan te/ 'di ltar mi gzung ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
180a8('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang / thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor
180b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod de/ de las bskyed nas/ 
180b2('bum): thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu
180b3('bum): ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / rnam par thar po'i sgo gsum mo/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ rgyun tu zhugs/ 
180b4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras budang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes dang // dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180b5('bum): po'i 'phags pa'i chos rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi wa nga ba'i 'bras bu shes bri'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/ 
180b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha ro bang tu phyin pa shes pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan rgya pha ra mang tu byon
180b7('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'i/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sa
180b8('bum): kha'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa sheso pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas 'o/ 
181a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug brgya dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gsheg
181a2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes pa'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang smos
181a3('bum): chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
181a4('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma rtogs par de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnamaso// byang chub sems dpa' sos
181a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ brag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba ste/ 'di da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos
181a6('bum): rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis pa com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad
181a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkre 'asprul pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol
181a8('bum): pom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems da'i sems dpa' chen pas rje sa thams cad mkhyen pa gang pab par 'gyungs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa bye brag mas
181b1('bum): mchis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam po// bye brag yong do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bye brag ci lta bu zhig tshas/ bcom ldan 'os kyis bka' sum dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
181b2('bum): chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing / chos thams cad la mun pa med pa 'thob la
181b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
181b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brte/ na pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181b5('bum): sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'bo la bkod nas/ 
181b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar lo 'god pa yin no// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad
181b7('bum): dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhog pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang
182a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs
182a2('bum): 'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / mi chen po'i mtshan
182a3('bum): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de la dran pa
182a4('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lusadang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang ga lus dang / la lus kyi rjes su lta// zhing brtson 'grus con shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig
182a5('bum): rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rna par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyad de/ lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la
182a6('bum): kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par dpyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor po dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'o sems dang
182a7('bum): phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos kyi rje su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde
182a8('bum): ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par dpyod do// chos la mi gnas par dpyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang
182b1('bum): nye bar len pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos
182b2('bum): rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o// rab 'byorang
182b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang
182b4('bum): ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi
182b5('bum): dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs// lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi ste// bas dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
182b6('bum): stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs tede dag ni sto bse lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
182b7('bum): chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu byung ba yang dag byang
182b8('bum): chub kyi yan lago dang / ting nge'i dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang
183a1('bum): lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byorang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'
183a2('bum): dang / dag pa'i 'tsho dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin te/ 'dri dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad zhes bya'o// nga la ti 'dun nasu
183a3('bum): gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par
183a4('bum): sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma
183a5('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'jan ces bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzi/ na gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzi/ 
183a6('bum): ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang pa'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du 'ashes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol
183a7('bum): gzugs rnams mthong ba de ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par gsu pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skyed ched la nye bar sbubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa
183a8('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni// rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med
183b1('bum): 'du she mad min skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang char ba 'gog pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par tha rad brgyad ces bya'o// mtha rad kyis
183b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug brgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ bden pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam rten
183b3('bum): dang po lnga nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam pa spyod pa nye bar zhi ba nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i
183b4('bum): dga' ba dang / bda' ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye ba sgrubs te gnas// de dga' ba las 'dod chag dang bral bas dran pa/ dang ldan zhing / shrI bzhin du btang snyoms su gan te/ bde
183b5('bum): ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyi dran pa dang ldan zhing badre ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsu pa la nye bar
183b6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas/ de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs
183b7('bum): su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi
183b8('bum): 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skyid nye bar bsgrubs te gan so sa/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lnga nye b.rang
184a1('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yaso zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso/ de rna ba thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skyed gis yang dag/ 
184a2('bum): par 'das te de cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rna ba thas cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ 'du she med 'du shes
184a3('bum): me man skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs shing gno
184a4('bum): 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug rgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang to mtha' dag rlung dang / 
184a5('bum): mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag kar po dang / mtha' dag rnam pa/ ra shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha'
184a6('bum): de dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis ge nan pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs phra mo dang / kha tog sdug pa dang / kha tog mi sdug
184a7('bum): ba mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil kyi mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'ud shi shing phyi rol gyi gzugs
184a8('bum): rags pa dang / kha tog sdug dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni/ zil mnon pa'i skye mched
184b1('bum): gnyis pa'o/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes shig phyi rog gi gzugs phyi mo dang // gdog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zi gyis mnan de mthong zhing 'du shes de
184b2('bum): drini zib kyis gnon pa'i skye ma ched gsum po so ga nang gzugs me par 'du shes shing kyi ro lang gi gzugs rags pa dag kha dog sdug pa dang // kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gsug de dag zimasan/ 
184b3('bum): te shes na zil kyis mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil mnon pa'i sku mjed bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du she shing phyi rong gi gzugs sngon po// khe tog sngon po sngon por snang ba ba dog ldan/ 
184b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog oM ma ka lca bu 'am/ yulabA ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sto ba/ sngo bar snang ba mdag sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes
184b5('bum): zil mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni/ zilagyis mnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du sha shing / phyi rol kyi gzugs ser po/ kha tog ser po ser b+h+yo
184b6('bum): snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta lta dper na/ shing ko shi ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba kha tog ser ba ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong ba/ gzugs
184b7('bum): gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni rdol kyi mnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs dmar po
184b8('bum): kha tog dmar po dmar bor snang ba/ mdog dmar por snang ba 'di lta ste dper na/ man dzu dza pa ka'i me tog lta bu 'am tong yul ba ra na sar byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar mtho
186a1('bum): ka yang gzugs de dag zib kyis mnan te shes/ zib kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis mnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs
186a2('bum): kar po/ mdog kar pe kar por snang ba mdog kar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma ba ba sangs kyi 'od gyir lta bu 'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar kar ba kha tog kar bkar bar snang ba/ mdog kar ba mtho
186a3('bum): yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis mnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
186a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyad pa sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol kyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub ba de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam kyi shes
186a5('bum): gang zhe na pasam gtan mo gnas te/ 'di shes pa bya zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen 'dus gsum kyi shes pa ma shes pa gang dang gang 'dang par 'gyur ba de la yid kyis
186a6('bum): ba byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ de'i smon 'di yongs su 'grub par 'gyur cing shes bya de yang shes pa de ni sman lam kyi shes pa shes bya'o// mngon par shes pa drug gang nen/ rdzul 'phrul gyi mi/ 
186a7('bum): bar shes pa dang / lha'i mig ga mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rold kyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i
186a8('bum): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ 
186b1('bum): ni med de dag ka ka de la dbang bcu gang zhen / che la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang nga yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'brug
186b2('bum): kha dbang ba dang / ye shel dbang ba dang / ches la dbang nga ste bcu pa de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gan su yang dag pa ji lta
186b3('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par ji yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongasu blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa
186b4('bum): gnasmra ba dang / rgyu'i rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma dan to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gi 'jig rten gi dang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan
186b5('bum): dang gang zag gzhan gyi mis pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zagagazhan gi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par shes bya ba yang dag
186b6('bum): ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba ji la ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
186b7('bum): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dged pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang dgongs
186b8('bum): ba nas/ tshe bas brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rangs rgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rje su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rje su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / skal pa brgya
187a1('bum): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rje su dgangs te/ bdag ni dzi lta bu zhig na 'dug la dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rig/ 
187a2('bum): ni'adi zhes bya ba gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di ze'o// yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam du gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhing skyes so// 
187a3('bum): zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skye so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa ma la dang bcas/ rtan chags dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rje su dgongaso// lha'i rnam par
187a4('bum): dag pa mi las 'das pA/ sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigaso// kha tog stug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan 'gro na 'khod pa dang / las
187a5('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhye na to// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur
187a6('bum): ba 'debs pa leg par lta ba ste/ de'i rgyu'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ nga
187a7('bum): gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod po dang ldan po/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta po dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i
187a8('bum): rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mthe ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa zad pa'i sems ca rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / zag pa med pa'i yang
187b1('bum): dag pa jig pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// stobs bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs der sangs/ 
187b2('bum): sa/ zhes dam bcas na 'dil chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag sa dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye rgu'i tshigs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 
187b3('bum): 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jig
187b4('bum): ba thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam cha'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam
187b5('bum): tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skarabar mi nus par bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de zla ge Sha 'di rnams yongs su zad pa
187b6('bum): gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye rgu'i chags gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
187b7('bum): par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob dang / bgo tsha ba med pa thob pa dang // mi 'jig pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca/ 
187b8('bum): 'khar ga ning du 'ang ga'i slo bsgog go/ mam pa'i gza pa 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang rnam ze'am/ lta pa 'dud dag tshangs pa'am de gzha sus kyang nga de/ cis dang ldan pa zhi ba
188a1('bum): bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su snyan pa de dag la sten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dum tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i
188a2('bum): tshigs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thab pa dang / bag tshab
188a3('bum): med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam cha'o// 'khor ga nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ 
188a4('bum): bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis yang dag par yang / dag par bskor bar bya'o// gang yang podag gis lam 'phags
188a5('bum): pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba de/ byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dra/ ga par zad par 'gyur bar snyan pa de dag la ton byas na/ sdug sngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes/ dge sbyong ngam
188a6('bum): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye rgu'i tshogs su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes
188a7('bum): su ma mthong bas de la bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam cha'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i
188a8('bum): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor ba mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste// bzhipo
188b1('bum): de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'iri sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste don soso yang dag par rig pa dang / chos sus yang dag par rig pa dag / nges pa'i tshig/ 
188b2('bum): se so yang dag par rig pa dang / sbas pa yang dag par rig pa dang // de dag kyang gang zhen/ don la dmigs pa dang / rnaMs la dmig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig sa dmigs pa dang / spos dmigs pa'o// rab
188b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spong pa yongs su spro dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i spyod pa yongs drug pa ma mnga' bas/ la'o// 
188b4('bum): shas su 'ong ngo zhe gang yang bcab par rmongs pa de ni na gshegs pa la mo ma ngo sgo/ 'di ni spong ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin/ gshegs pa ni gsung gi spya 'i deng ldan pa ste/ de la nin
188b5('bum): gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shos su 'ong ngo zhes gang yong bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mo mi bye'i ste/ 'di ni 'i srung
188b6('bum): med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa mi mnga' bas kha lngas shes su 'ong ngo zhes/ gang
188b7('bum): yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsgrub pa med pa gsum pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgengs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
188b8('bum): ston pa'i tshe la las rna ba bdud de/ rim 'gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhag pa dang / mos na de gshes pa'i chos la phan du byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug yon por mi 'gyur
190a1('bum): 6 shaka yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgengs pa nye bar gzhag pa'odag la la rna ba bdud de rim 'gror bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhag pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
190a2('bum): nan tan du ma byed na yang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs pa'i mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba bdud te rim
190a3('bum): 'gro nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhag pa la chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan du byed/ la la rna ba ba dang de rim 'gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems gnyer bar gzhag pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i
190a4('bum): duchis la nan du mi byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang lnga na zhing mkhyen pa 'am/ btang snyems su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni
190a5('bum): dgongs pa nye bar gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin ga/ gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gi sangs rgyas// / bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos bston pa'i phyir/ 
190a6('bum): sems can thams cad kyi den mdzad pa la lus ma 'di 'a ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gsheg sa pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos
190a7('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs kyang / lus kyi gyur pa yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin
190a8('bum): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi bda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rte
190b1('bum): kha zhi lan gsum du rtog pa mjed de/ dngos sun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po/ sems can mtha' las pa yongs smin pa bya bas gzigs pa rtag par 'byung bste/ de na
190b2('bum): debazhin gshegs thugs chen bzhes bya'o/ khyor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ma 'das pa bcoM brgya dkang ne na/ de bzhin gshegs pas khrum pa 'i mang // mi ma 'i
190b3('bum): dgangs pa nyams pa mi mngade/ 'du she sna tshogs mi mang // mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'a'i/ ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms mi ming / mos pa yangasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs surnams
190b4('bum): ba ma me la'o/ dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi ma 'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su rnams pa mi mang 'i/ shes rab yongs su dra nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su rnams pa mim
190b5('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzig pa mngasu pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad
190b6('bum): shas sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
190b7('bum): shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgya
190b8('bum): kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad so// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang yang dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i/ 
191a1('bum): mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// // shes rab bam po// // de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang / 
191a2('bum): zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa
191a3('bum): dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mthong ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla dang blo dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs bu nub pa dang / gse
191a4('bum): gi kha tog dang / mdag shin tu 'jam pa dang / sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khril pa dang / zhal mdzod spus rgyan pa/ seng gi rol stod lta bu dang / brag pa'i lhan mdzes byar grub pa dang / phrag se shin tu
191a5('bum): sa pa dang / ro 'gro ba'i mchog dang / shing na ya gr-i ta ltar chu zheng gab pa/ dang / dbu spyi rtsag dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / 
191a6('bum): tshems shin tu kar ba dang / chems shin tu mnyam pa dang / chos gas bzang ba dang / tshems bzhi bcu chang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / bo'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs
191a7('bum): kha'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'thil la/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs sang dang ldan pa mu rgyud can sde ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa 'drin ste/ rus pa'am ngas la gzugs pazhes pa dang ma
191a8('bum): khas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi 'thol gnyis mnyam par sa la 'dzag cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pago/ ga dang bu'i rgyal po ltar phrag dang zhabs kyi
191b1('bum): sor mo 'dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dang / 'gur gyi lhun shing
191b2('bum): tu mthong bas/ bdun shin tu mthong ba'o// phyag dang zhabs sor mo ring bas/ sar mo ring ba'o// rtid pa yangs pas rting yangs pa'o// sku lag pa bdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pusaM li
191b3('bum): lha dang khong bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mthong ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas ya na lag ga sU gyen du 'khyil pa'o// ri dgas a ne ye'i byin pa dang / smig ma dang / ldum bu
191b4('bum): dar drang zhing ma nyams rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pazlum pas ri dgas e na ye'i byin pa lta bu'o// rA dang bar gauzhag ste/ da ma btud kyang phyag gi 'thil gnyis/ bume ldang la
191b5('bum): reg pas phyag ba dang por spobs pa'o// glang po dang / cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu
191b6('bum): spangs par gser gyi kha drog wA bu ldan pas/ gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dadus shin tu sbyangs pas 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ skul rnal mi 'go bas mdog kun 'jam pa'i
191b7('bum): shin du rnam par bye ba'i skye shong/ gnyis su med pas su meng nas gams phyogs su ma b+h+yo ba/ ma tog gu 'dur dang Sh+TA d+ha dnga'i mi dang / ba m-i mdog kyang 'dugs ma dang / 
191b8('bum): byama'i rigs par gas so mdzo sus sri ma po shin du brtson pas nam mdzad cu brgyan pa'o// ri mang tshangs sri ga'i rjod / mthung chung rig pa na
192a1('bum): phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gsar gyi gtan pa byis pa ltar phrag sar legs par grub pas p+lag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa
192a2('bum): drang ba med pas ro 'gro ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya ya kr-i ta wAr chu zheng dag pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnga' ba'i legs par
192a3('bum): grub la/ mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'o 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin yangs pas ljags shin tu srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang / bya ka la bying ka lte bu'i gsung
192a4('bum): mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'gram pa me ldo gi dkyil 'khor da ltar legs shing mdzes shing grub par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'ga' pa lta bu'o/ me tog gu nau 'da' dang / dang gi bcag
192a5('bum): 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i che ngas mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// chems la mthon dman med pas/ chems thags mnyam/ pa'o// tshems la 'tshams ma 'dod pas tshems thags
192a6('bum): babazang ba'o// zla 'og dge dgu med pas chems mnyam shing bzhi bcu chang ba'o// bkar nag gi na ma 'dres pa las shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pas ma g.yogs pa spyan dkar nag 'byed pa'o// rdzi ma la 'og
192a7('bum): shin tu legs par ga na la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma la bsu skyal dang / chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / rtswag lag khang dang / mchod rten la stsogs pa yang sto stang du byas pas phyag dang / zhabs 'khor
192a8('bum): lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam lo rten pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mig g.yo zhing shin tu rten pa'i snga ltas// byin po dang / ngag snyan pa dang don spyad pa
192b1('bum): sa sa ng+ge g+hu rnam 'ad / den nga du du sa la/ [] du nga / ba ba'im nas ma na/ byas dang @
192b2('bum): zhing 'jam pa dang / 'dun shin tu mtho ba dang ste/ de gnyis ni 'aza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung bzhom zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// ba cings grol ba dang / smug gi rim 'gro bya dang / sreg gco
192b3('bum): pa spangs pas sor me ring ba dang / rti ngas pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing dang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang de bzung ba mngon par 'phel zhing zhabs kyi gang mthong
192b4('bum): ba dang yan ga sro gyon 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga lhas so// rig pa'i bzo dang gnas dang / rim 'gar byas shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas rigs a na ya'i
192b5('bum): byin pa lta bu'o/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i sde ltas so// bdog kyi da yod pa'i ni rol bslangs na ma 'khong bar rtong zhing med ces ma byas pas / phyag brla dang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad mngal ba dang
192b6('bum): dal ba'i snga ltas so/ 'grogs pa dang / mdza shes pa dang / gnyen ma phye ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongasu srungs
192b7('bum): segriseng ba'i gnas skyugs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mnga' ba'i snga smras so// sman dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhan med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ ser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu
192b8('bum): 'jam pa sa/ de gnas ni bdan dang / na bza' dang khang pa dang / gzhas mang khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i sngags so// 'du 'ja spangs pa dang / 'okhan po dang / slob ba ma dza/ lam dang / thun/ 
193a1('bum): gteg la stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim 'gror byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol brnal ma gsan par spu re rje nas kayas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus rgyan
193a2('bum): de ni nyams pa med pa'i snga ltas so// ma snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro sto ltar bu dang phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub ste/ de ni
193a3('bum): thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim 'gro dang / sman dang / nyams su phan pa'i byin pa dang / rim 'gro byas pas phrag so rgyas dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas
193a4('bum): skyed mo tshal dang btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dga' ba'i zam dpa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba dang / gnas dang stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la stsogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba
193a5('bum): sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas/ shing n+ya ya gro ta wAr chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ mnga' ba chen po monga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por cho ga
193a6('bum): snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su badre bar smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang
193a7('bum): ldan zhes bya ba ni yongasu shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa medo pa dang / zab cing dbyangs med par rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtam ma smra zhing rnar nyan pa dang / ma 'khrug
193a8('bum): shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing / dus dus smra bas seng gi 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni chag kun kyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// ra mi 'gror bya ba dang / brnyas med pa gnyis
193b1('bum): kyimachom yos cagasems shin tug nam n+d+he/ danI la khor snganas pas smras pa sa// sun ring ponas ning bram mod cig mAngs/ rlom zhugs

193b3('bum): bas snyan bkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rjem laT swA/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i sngags so// rab 'byor de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mim chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// de'i dzin ni/ 
193b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byang bzang po brgya bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du pa thams cad rdzas dben pasnye/ sen ma grangs te/

193b6('bum): 'i mdog nub pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon par 'byong ba ste/ sen mtho ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nul khan thob ma minga' ba ste/ sor mo
193b7('bum): ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ ser mo rgyas pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dge pa'i rtsi ba rim kyis grub paste/ sor ma ring gyis na na// 
193b8('bum): yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste rtsa mi mngon pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i bdun
194a1('bum): gros phye rtses mdu ba med pa 'in// sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rnams ni/ shin tu ben pa'i tshigs sung nas skye/ srong bu myi mngon pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam
194a2('bum): bla dang mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol zhags mi mnyam pa med pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/

198a3('bum): chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

198b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdung dro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pa rolab tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar

198b3('bum): glo zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i'o me/ byang chu pA sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad ston to// rigs
198b4('bum): kyi bu tshul shog yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas bar gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la gyis shigateyi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig
198b5('bum): yi ge gr-icig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes ba rA gyes shig yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cadashes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar kyis
198b6('bum): byung ba'i ring bzhin thams cad she bar gyis shig ma gi gcog tu'o gri bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ni rnams par shog da yi ge bAni bcu rtsa gnyis su yi kle gcig 'dus par rnams shig cos
198b7('bum): sngon to// gang rgyam byang chuba'i ma mo dbu sem su dpa 'a chen 'di yi ga gcig la mkhas pasnyen/ ge ba'i na rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ TI ge gcig gan du 'i ge d+hani 'a
198b8('bum): 'dus pa sgom rlos gyis kyi yin te/ de ltar 'i ge mngon pa slas gam ma lam byas pa rnam mi gas kying mngon par phru pa la gnas pa yin no// ma rgya di dzin thaM 'a
200a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nos la mkhas pa dang / yi ga la mkhas pa yin te/ chos lnga mkhas padas/ yi ge la mkhas pas yi ga mang pos
200a2('bum): yi ge med pas chos stend kyang rta rab 'byorang chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'byung ba'i chos so// 
200a3('bum): gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das yang
200a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu ma dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po ya mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
