200a6('bum): ni pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa dang / rgyung meng pa bzhi dado/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
200a7('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar bskyod la spyod pa dang / mthir kyis
200a8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
200b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso rgyud dang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po rgya bcu la rnam par spyod pa'i/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gang+gA
200b2('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du bdagos pa yang mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs so// gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
200b3('bum): mi dmigs pasad+ha tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs su ma mchis// sems can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su
200b4('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigasu ma mchiso// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
200b5('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgya cur dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa ni sems can ma mchi/ sa so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
200b6('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad kyi bar da ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so// mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu
200b7('bum): rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
200b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ma dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos lo dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorard de de bzhin ni/ de de bzhon te
201a1('bum): ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
201a2('bum): stong pa nyid du rig pa'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig brar bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel bar byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid
201a3('bum): du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gsor ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang
201a4('bum): slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tsharo bo bo dang / tshor bar byed pa blo da/ mthong ba pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran po nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag tha
201a5('bum): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa steng pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 
201a6('bum): bas mA dag/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug byeng / rje bar bya brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par rgu ngo/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshon ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa
201a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid du rig par byan/ 
201a8('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong bo'i 'bras bu dang / dgro ba ni nyid pa dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / 
201b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// ra
201b2('bum): 'byord de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 
201b3('bum): d+hi ltar stong po nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to// dwe de ltar me thong nas chos thams cad sprob pa med par shes te/ chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/ gnyis su mi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
201b4('bum): du yang ston par byed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshe gus pa'i sprul pa ni sprul par bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / semadasi can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ tshul khrim
201b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang pa la brtson gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bsam gtan kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyin pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
201b6('bum): bye sbyar/ ka la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / sa pa chud med pa med pa bzhi dang / la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs kyi chos sum rtsa bdun lo sgyur
201b7('bum): la lo 'phags bu'i badren pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / la la mthu ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang mtshan mo meng pa dong smon pa med pa dang / e ma mngon par na
201b8('bum): bA lnga la ster/ la la ting nge 'dzin dang / la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang da la sa byas pa
202a1('bum): ka chen po dag la la snying rje chen po dang / la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa sbyor la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
202a2('bum): la dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen kyi ba rol sbyar na/ rab 'byor de snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsoyod pa bcom ldan
202a3('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te
202a4('bum): de dag phyin ci log rnams la yongs su grol nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
202a5('bum): dpang 'du byad dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzug/ kye mi bcings pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// 
202a6('bum): char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mi 'ings ma grol ba gang yin pa deni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar kye ma mchis ma grol ba gang yin pa/ 
202a7('bum): de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
202a8('bum): rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rong 'byor de sar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro 'od tu phyin pal spyod pa'i ma/ sos can rnams la chos sbyin kyang skyes cam
202b1('bum): sa ma ga seM rkyen po nas thams cang mi dmigs pa 'di 'i dmig na kris gas / gzugs slong bzhiba'i gnas pa na pa dang / tshang ba dang / dunan/ 
202b2('bum): da/ 'dun dag/ rlom pa shes pasong ba nyid kyi migs pa'i rgyu drung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du spong pa nyid mi drimigs pa nus gyis gnas te/ 'dun gyis dang / 'dus ma byas kau
202b3('bum): rnams son gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya de lta bu 'dzibo ni mi migs te/ dngos po med pa pa dngos po ma gnas/ rang bzhin mo gnas so/ 
202b4('bum): gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gi dngos po mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la bzhin la yang bzhin
202b5('bum): mi gnas so// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se/ sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu/ 
202b6('bum): phye ste/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyini pa la de ltar stong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
202b7('bum): rnams dang / rong sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi sbyin du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyem/ 
202b8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang / rong sangs rgyas de dag dang / thos de dag gis kyang chos rnyed de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams chos ston to// dri chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'dir// de ci'i phyir nen
203a1('bum): rab 'byor da chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do// de dag dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gang 'dara' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do// de nas tshe dang ldan la rab 'byor dkyis
203a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas pad te// bcom ldan 'das gal tid ltar chos kyi dbyings la yang 'dang bam mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mi thar la yang 'ad ba ma mchis na kyi lags// sen
203a3('bum): gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dge pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lag sam/ nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par she pa yang gzhan
203a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ ches kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
203a5('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhi/ ga lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang / do ni ma yin no// gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
203a6('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings gzhan/ 
203a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan lo// chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i ma
203a8('bum): yang gzhan pa ma yin no// gsol pa rol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan lo/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags
203b1('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhal/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
203b2('bum): kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags// 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams
203b3('bum): kyi rnam par smin pa/ nag po'i ni sems can dmyal ba dang / bal song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten kar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ dkar po ni lha dang mi/ kar nag gi chos rnams
203b4('bum): kyi rnam par smin pa/ kar nag bde ba dang / sna ga sdel nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos kyi rnam pa ni smin pa mi gnag cing bkar ba'i/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang
203b5('bum): lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod
203b6('bum): par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de kun rdzob kyi dben pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa stan kyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni rnam par dgod pa stand par mi nus so
203b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gyin rnam par rtag tu med pa/ rjod du med pa/ tha snyad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming snyan pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa me
203b8('bum): lta ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste
205a1('bum): ka 'bras bu rnam par dkod rnam pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
205a2('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord ji byis pa so so'i skye ba rnams kun rdzob kyi
205a3('bum): bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sa mo// gal te shes na ni de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugro pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ 
205a4('bum): rang byang chub 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor da byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la la yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa yang med/ lam sgom pa yang med par
205a5('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga la 'ong / rab 'byor nga 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag las 'bros bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
205a6('bum): mo bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sngag mdzub/ de na mni te/ lam skems pas 'bras bu theb pa'am/ 'bras bu thob parahA
205a7('bum): ba med de/ blarab 'byor lamam bsgoms par yang 'bras bu thob pa med de/ lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa med // byi skye sa 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med/ lam la ma gan par 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ 
205a8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na tho chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sherab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma khas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod bar byed de/ 'dus byas kyi lam
205b1('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod par mi byed do// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das du gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'das byas kyi khams kyi ris su bcad cing 'bras/ 
205b2('bum): bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyar ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs gi rje pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems skabs pas lan cig phyir
205b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma ma yi rgyargya mo'i chen pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba ldi spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ 
205b4('bum): kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'og pa'i chos can du shes pas byang chub bo// bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyar be'i nyon moms pa thamasaspangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsu
205b5('bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsu ngas pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// btsam
205b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byorang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa ya
205b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas yin// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma byas bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'das ma byas bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
205b8('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
207a1('bum): gas gang gi cha rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid meng bar mtshan gcig tu chud par 'gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas zhe 'am 'dus ma byas shes chos/ 
207a2('bum): gang yang ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mau lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po yang shi rab kyi
207a3('bum): rol da tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de nye bar bzung ste/ seM sa can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to// de dag kyang spen pa'i pha
207a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'amabartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'amabasam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol
207a5('bum): tu phyin pa 'am// bsam gtan dang po 'om/ bsam gtan ga nyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ ba sam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am dga' ba 'am
207a6('bum): khatang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ 
207a7('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam
207a8('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kI yan lag rnams sam/ lam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
207b1('bum): rnams sam rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin/ 
207b2('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sku rnams dang / de gzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa rnams dang / seM sa yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams partan chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgya
207b3('bum): ches ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de mngon par zhen pa med pas gong la yang chags pa med de/ 'di lta ste dper na de bzhinog/ 
207b4('bum): ba'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su rtod yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chag/ dpa mang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na semacan thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du
207b5('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rten gyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
207b6('bum): zlog pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sam/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma 'dus byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus kyi chos kyi
207b7('bum): 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
207b8('bum): rnams kyi pa'o// rab 'byar de 'azhin du byang chub sems dopa'i sems dpa' chen po yid pa yang tu byin 'a drug dang / chos thams cad la skyed de/ chos gang sa yang gnas pa'i mtshogs pa med// de ci'i phyir ni
208a1('bum): denas ma ldan rab spyong kyis bamam ldan das pa 'di skad ces gsote/ zhe bcom ldan 'as drid 'dun pa sems dpa sems dpa' chen pomachem rnams kyi
208a2('bum): mtshan nyid rab tu rtog pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol dang / rab 'durang sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug la yongs su skyed pa med de// bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs
208a3('bum): smad ba med do// phyi nang gi chos la chos la yongs su spyod pa medad do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongasan su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
208a4('bum): ches rnams pa yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su snang pa med de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye mchod dngan
208a5('bum): kha.A ga/ rten cing 'brel ba'i 'byung ba la yongs su spyad pa med do// pha rob tu phyini pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dong/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun pa yongs myong ba mong // 'angs
208a6('bum): ma rnams dge pa mdzananam sa cid mas dang / gzugs pa'i rnams pa 'jug pa rnam sa rnam pa ngas mdzod kyis gan pa'i mas jog pa su dag
208b1('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btsa rgyud la yongs su spyong pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
208b2('bum): kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spong ngo // rab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyi
208b3('bum): mtshan nyid rtog du rtogs pa yin no// shes rab bam po/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam sgom pa la rten kyang / kun nyon
208b4('bum): mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'gro ba lnga 'i 'khor ba na yang mi gda' na/ lam sbom du ci mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byer de ji snyam du
208b5('bum): semasade bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig brta/ rkyen de/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta
208b6('bum): bu'i dngos po gang yod dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de nam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig rte nad te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par
208b7('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ 'khor ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ches rnam
208b8('bum): kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa non/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ gzugs zas cad sprul pa sa bu lags me dang tsho ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 
210a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa rab 'byor nga gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom/ 
210a2('bum): ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa la bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa lta bu la ni gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 
210a3('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang la grol bar 'gyur ba'i gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
210a4('bum): chen po'i mthur 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa sbed pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ bal song/ 
210a5('bum): gi skye gnas so/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am mi da dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmig sam// ga/ so la da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
210a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nasayongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/ 
210a7('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo / rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
210a8('bum): chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur ltar 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal zhing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa
210b1('bum): lags/ bsam rten bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sum bcu rtsa

210b3('bum): par bgad pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa// rab 'byor da gal te sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
210b4('bum): rnams kyi don du skal pa grangs med par/ byang chub sems dpaspyad pa spyod pa'i me/ rab 'byor de sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thamasacad sprul pa lta bur mi shes de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sas/

210b6('bum): 'gags tanas ma ma su trA~MHb+h+ya0/ migs // snam sa / ma ldan sa kyis gnas/ ngan po'i ma ma rnams da

210b8('bum): nomolas ni/ rgyo chung sa chis dang sasas dang min pa shes sa kyi pa mang btsun pa lathud cing / dedag mi dmatshan thalas gyen du bsrung nga// gang ma da bcom ldan dang ming ni ga lags/ mtshanam ni bcas
211a1('bum): bcag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ste ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo 'ur gi ming gis sgro btags pa'o// 'di lta ste ming zhe bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzug
211a2('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med zhes bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba'am

211a7('bum): ming thams cad ni yongs su brtogs pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongasu brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba la khyen chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnam

211b1('bum): rnams la chos ston pa'o yin no// rab 'byor dmatshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa sos skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i mnanam ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzug kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs
211b2('bum): med pa'i mtshan ma'i rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / mo 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am bzang ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am nye ba gang chos thams
211b3('bum): cad skad gcig ma la kun tu rtogs pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni tshis kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshar mar bzung bas/ 
211b4('bum): yongs su brtags shing nyan mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nide gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

211b6('bum): ba zhes bya ba gang gnyis su mi gyur ba de ltar 'god cing gzhig so/ rang 'byor dkar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shArab kyi pa med tu byon pal spyang ba ma/ thabs ma khas pas sems can rnams margyan
211b7('bum): malas rnam par gro zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dkyis su ra tu gang // gas so pa bcom ldan 'das gas te chos 'di dag thams cad ni tsam du ngas to dang mocan ma rags pa/ btags pa tsam thas / 
211b8('bum): su brtags pa las 'byung ba lags na/ bcom sngon 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob pa la gzhan yang dag
212a1('bum): gragag pa cis kyi thad par bab pa la gnag cing dge ba'i rtsa pa de dag gis sa nags yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnam sa theg pa gsum la smra 'a phags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkur pa na
212a2('bum): rab 'byor gal te dngos pa 'am dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi/ khyad par yang thob par mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa
212a3('bum): sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di lta dngos po'i mtshan ma med/ dngos po yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshen mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis

212a6('bum): mtshan ma mdo pa'i nub gyis dran panyabar gzhag pa pa ni dang / yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / byang nu'i kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yangs sa/

212a8('bum): nul gis rnam par bar rab rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i 'dzin pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa byes
212b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ yongs su rdzogs su par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
212b2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bcwa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongasu rdzogs par/

212b7('bum): yi sa 'gyi ba ma ches mo mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'ang dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ 'di dag ni mi dag pa'i chos sa/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag
212b8('bum): ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// rgyu de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mang gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun meng ma yin ma yin pa'i chos
213a1('bum): 'di dag can thos kyinas so// 'di dag ni mas rgyas kyi chos son 'a dag ni byung chub sems dang mas// 'di dag nas sa rgyas kyi rnam ma zhes bgyi bar ji mar 'grang bar brtse// dam ldan

213a5('bum): 'bras bu 'o/ yan TIg phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bru/ sa bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol ba bcom
