272b7('bum): cig ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la
272b8('bum): 'bul ba byed cing / ngo 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang / nyan
273a1('bum): thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa'i nam bza' ro brgyad dang ldan pa'i mngon par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a2('bum): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la lha rjes kyi byug pa yongs su 'bul bar byed kyang / de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
273a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad lha rdzas kyi reg pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
273a4('bum): 'di snyam du khyed kyis bsam pa tsam du gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 
273a5('bum): sems can rnams la dbul zhing yongasu btang bar bya'o// snyam du sems te/ de de ltar sems pa'i tshe 'di snyam du dge na 'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ bla na med pa yang
273a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang yid kyis bsams/ pa tsam gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / 
273a7('bum): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yongs su grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
273a8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ la la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan dang / po la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// 
273b1('bum): sa pa gan / sems can mas kya kya ga sa da/ sa ga ky-i sa bya nas sa na
273b2('bum): mam rnams skye nas byed do/ sa kya sa sa zhesas pa sa me / cus da pa da du sa
273b3('bum): gzhag go// sems can thams ca kya shesakyi myed 'du shes myed sbyin sbyin cid pa 'gro 'o// mal dag N+DI kyis kyi dran pa sa nag pa rnams po rnam par / 
273b4('bum): semam sa bya na ga rnasas 'a da do// ma sa sa bya dag par spyong nga/ rdzu m+bu g-i/ ma / 
273b5('bum): ga nga/ phags pa'i mas spya lag brgyun pa gas / sems lags pasam sa rgyad kyis na no// la ga nyid kyi ldanas pa smra
273b6('bum): ming ba mam sa byed par rtson pa skyed pa sa pa gyur/ sems pan mas sa kya rnamapas rang na ma sems tha khyo sa rdorje
274a1('bum): snyam ste de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/ de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i zhing de'i sam
274a2('bum): can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang mi 'bral zhing / tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 
274a3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / mi 'bral bar shog shig ces bya bar bsam pa skyed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
274a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// de nam bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd kyi bar du bla na
274a5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya ste/ de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yid/ sems can thams cad dang ldan
274a6('bum): pa yin te/ de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang marjes pa yin/ sems can thams cad gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rna na po des yongasu smyin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste
274a7('bum): bsod nas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par grub ste/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
274a8('bum): kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed do/ ji nas kyang ngan song gsum du gnas pa'i mying yang mi srid pa dang / lba ba'i rnam par gdags pa'i myong yang mi srid pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
274b1('bum): gti mug tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / bud med dang / skyes par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / theg pa gnyis kyi gdags pa'i yang mi srid pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug/ 
274b2('bum): bsngal ba dang / bdag med par gnas pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i ming yang mo spyod pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i mang yang mo srid pa dang / 
274b3('bum): yongs su gdags pa'i mying yang mi srid pa dang / brag la nyal ba dang / kun nas snang bar gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang / phyind ci log tu gdags pa'i yad myo mi srid pa dang / 'bru/ 
274b4('bum): bur gdags pa'i mying yangs sri cing / gzhan du na sems can de/ dadage 'do pa canan du shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/ de nang gi ngos po dag las 'od sa ste/ stong pa nyid
274b5('bum): g+ha~M smA dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa med pa'i skang skye ma 'gag pa'i sgra dang / thos thams cad banyid kyis stong pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad chos thams
274b6('bum): sa byeng ba'i byung bdang / rgyas dag gings su maban rdzo ba med pa m+b+ha nga / de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byas rung ste
274b7('bum): thams cad chos thams cad kyis skyong ngo // gang song pa de la ma tshan ma med pa des ni sprin pa med do// zhes bya bar chos pas da pa'i sgra nyin ma tshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro yang rung 'dug kyang ru
274b8('bum): snod kyang rung / zhas kyang rung gi cag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i das bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo // del bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang blan med pa yang gi
276a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
276a2('bum): gi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad legs par brjod par gyur te/ sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa de dag
276a3('bum): thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/ sems can
276a4('bum): gang yang 'di ni ches so// 'di ni chos ma yin no// zhes bya bar the tsom za bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la
276a5('bum): ni chos ma yin pa gang yang med de thams cad kyang chos so// de la sems can gang mi dge ba'i rtsubs non/ pa dang / sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i// 
276a6('bum): rtsa ba ma skyed pa/ mi dge ba'i gshes gnyen gis yongs su zind pa bdag tu lta bar bying nas sa lta'i rnams pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba rtag pa'am/ chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa log par 'dzin pa/ 
276a7('bum): pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
276a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni/ chos ma yin pa la ni chos so zhes zer/ chos la la yang chos so zhes zer te/ de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos spongs nas lus zhig
276b1('bum): pa'i 'og tu shi nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
276b2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhing / 'khor ba'i khongs su chud po'i sems can dgra sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par bkrol de/ de ltar rnam bkrol nas nges pa'i phung po rab tu
276b3('bum): 'god de/ der bkod pa rnams ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su
276b4('bum): spangs pas/ sems can rnams 'jig rten gi chos sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam zagapa dang bcas pa'i chos sem/ zag pa med pa'i chos sam/ 'dus kyi
276b5('bum): chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chechos sam gang / la yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// 
276b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// le'u drug cu drug pa'o// 
276b7('bum): des ched stan parab kyi kyis com lda sal 'dzin ces gsod to// dus kyi chu sems su phyengs dpa' rkyen po ngas pa ba N+DI b+hu n+d+ha/ mangs shes na rgya
276b8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ ma nges pa ma yin no// gsol dpa/ nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung
277a1('bum): po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ phung po gang du nges pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

277a3('bum): pabacom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes pa 'am 'on tam phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

277a5('bum): ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te//

277a7('bum): 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorapa
277a8('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po/ bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang // 
277b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes po rab sgom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med do// gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi
277b2('bum): spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas myed do// glen pa dang / lkugs par 'gyur ba'i sul du skye bar mi gnas med do// mtha' 'thob kyi kla glau dang / mo sbyin cing 'khor bzhi rgyun mi 'chad pa'i yul du skye ba'i gan
277b3('bum): myed do// log par lta ba'i gnas rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gi sgra mi grag pa de lta bur smra
277b4('bum): ba'i gnas med do// bya ba ma yin pa'i gnas lto bar ltung ba'i gnas myed do// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
277b5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ lhag pa'i bsam pas/ yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la skyo// ces bya ba'i gnas myed do// go lgad pa bcom ldan
277b6('bum): 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mo skyeb ma lags na/ gang 'di sa re bzhin gshegs pani/ 
277b7('bum): kyang byol songs gi rgyum tu skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pab/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems pa chen po ni mi dge
277b8('bum): kha'i las kyis byol song gi rgyun tu skye ba ma yin gyis lus gang dang ngag gis sems can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dang / de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam shing sems can rnams kyi don tu yongs su 'dzi nad te// 
278a1('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing / de la la la zhing gsod du 'ongs nas kyang /

278a5('bum): gang la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to// bcom/ ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
278a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang med de/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
278a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang / yongasu
278a8('bum): rdzogs par mi bya ba myed do// dge ba'i chos gang yang yongasu rdzogs par ma byas par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu med de/ 
278b1('bum): de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor de dag bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/ 
278b2('bum): byab la bsas par bya ste/ des duskabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su can gyi/ ngagachags kyi 'jams sbyor thathams cad meng su spong ngo // gsul dang/ bcom ldan
278b3('bum): ngos ni sa da/ byang chub sems pa sems dpa' chen no/ 'phags cos zab pas mchis pa den zung nga ldan pa/ ngan song ma/ bral song ni gnas su skye

278b7('bum): gsol da / yom ma ma so/ sa'anams su dang / sa bzhin gshegs pas kyis so myi gnas par 'gyur / gso

279a2('bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongasu sbyin par byed do//

279a7('bum): shig bstan tam/ gzhan yang sgyu ma sna tshogs bstan na/ de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srogs chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam// gar+b+he/ 
279a8('bum): babacom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pag rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang cheng du bsas shing / re la bu'i
279b1('bum): mu saM yong su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams gi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
279b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa myed pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar ldan zhing lus ngag dang gang gis/ sems can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongasu 'dzin pa ni thabs shin tu

279b5('bum): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu seMs can rnas kyi don byed kyang / des de la gang la yang reg par 'gyur ba medado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
279b6('bum): byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba'i de lta bu'i chos gsuM po de dag thos cad mi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni 'di ltar chos gsum
279b7('bum): po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong bas/ stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed/ stong pa nyid kyi chos gang la yang reg par mi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya bo ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la
279b8('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmyigs so// de ni dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 'chang rgya'o// gsol pa
280a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas gi/ shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyind pa 'bra' zhig la gnas shing / rnam pa de lta bu'i thugs
280a2('bum): mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i khongasu ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te
280a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la chos gang yang khong su chud pa 'am
280a4('bum): khosu chud pa zhes bgyi ba mi mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das stong ngo // bcom ldan
280a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lag so// bcom ldan
280a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spod par rig par
280a7('bum): bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom 'das la 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod cing // chos thams
280a8('bum): cing stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du mchis pa dag/ 'jig rten gi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas
280b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos ston cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol / 
280b2('bum): tu phyind pa mngon par bsgrubs pa lags/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces gsol to// rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
280b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mdzo // 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom
280b4('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // gzhan du na/ ming dang brdegs pa'i nyes par bzung nas bstan pa ma gtogs te// gdag
280b5('bum): ba kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rten gi khams/ de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa ste/ gdags pa'i rgyu de dag kyang ngo // 
280b6('bum): bo nyid kyis mi stong pa'i zhig ma yin na ni/ nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyid nyi tshe ba ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
280b7('bum): po thabs mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyin pa la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rolapa tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lnga'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / 
280b8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rna ba dang / pha rol kyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gi gnas rje su dran pa dang / 'chi 'phro shes pa mngon par bsgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
281a1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon par shes
281a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind par 'dus pa ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa/ bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams
281a3('bum): cad mthong / gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ stong
281a4('bum): pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i mig mngon par
281a5('bum): bsgrub ste/ lha'i myig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid 'o du mthong ste/ chos de dag la gnas shing / las mngon par ba te sgrub po/ las mngon por bsgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston/ 
281a6('bum): te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags pa mi dmyigaso// de ltar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par sgrub pa ste na mngon
281a7('bum): par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag med do// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad stong ste/ de de dag
281a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam ni shes rab bam// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
281b1('bum): mnam med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis
281b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs rnams sam nA mi 'jigs pa rnams samad so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangasu rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ 
281b3('bum): nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya
281b4('bum): byed de/ de la sems cad ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la da'adi skad du tshe ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig 'phongs pa ni sdug bsdu dal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan rgyo
281b5('bum): donag ci spos kyis/ de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin sa tham/ kyang ba bar gyis zhig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis shi ga/ ngas pa ni zil gis non cing / nying sha nyid gis zos ste/ ngan song gsum
281b6('bum): byas pa pa g+h+nA d+hA She shes kyis spyod mas can chus khrims Na dgar snyed bye gas 'dis du chos spyod de/ kye skyes bu dgacus ma sa na 'i sdug sas bsnyen rgyug rnams padapas ni na
281b7('bum): gan kyang bya bar mi nus na// gzhang gi dum kyi smos te/ chus khrims ngan pa ma rnam par zin pa ni seMs can myal ba ma na ming gi skye gnas sa med gzhon rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du sbya
281b8('bum): bdag kyang gdon par mnus na/ gzhan gdon pas ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal khrims pa'i sems 'ga' cham gyo go skabs kyang mi bye'o// phyis 'gyod pacar du gyur re zhes chos srid do// sas can pa sbyin da/ 
282a1('bum): sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// de ltar khyed cil ci gnod sems ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de smra bas/ 
282a2('bum): nabyed pan tshun sems la khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/ de bas na khyog kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gri go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// 
282a3('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa 'di dag 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na
282a4('bum): gzhan gi don lta ci smos/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag
282a5('bum): kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis dede'i phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ug tsam gi go skabs kyu/ mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur du ta re zhes chos ston to// 
282a6('bum): sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba ni rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am
282a7('bum): byol song ma gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spros kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yes
282a8('bum): ba'i sems 'ag tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyurd ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa'i
282b1('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'tshal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nunas na/ gzhan gi don lta ni spros te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am na byol song gi skye gnas
282b2('bum): samagashin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ag tsam gi gi skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed
282b3('bum): pa de dgra ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// la mo ngan par zhugs
282b4('bum): pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa ro'i lam la sbyar te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stond to// khyed chos gang lo mngon par 'a zhen par gyur
282b5('bum): pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rjes ni mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 
282b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing // sems can rjes kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 
282b7('bum): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khaMs thas cad mthong ste/ de de dag du rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa'i/ tshul khrims saM/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus so/ bas gtan nim
282b8('bum): shes rab bam// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnaMs sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
283a1('bum): 'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// 
283a2('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang
283a3('bum): ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor de/ nyon thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi la mo 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sem la sbyor
283a4('bum): zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyod chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong dad pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong po
283a5('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
283a6('bum): gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par/ sems can rnams la chos ston par mi nus ste/ lam gol bar
283a7('bum): zhugs pa'i sems can 'akyang lam du gzung bar mi nunus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya mdab ma med pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
283a8('bum): pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma rten par/ sems can rnams la chos ston par mi nus so// rab 'byor bde bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon
283b1('bum): par shes pa rnams la mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa de dag gis/ sems can rnams kyi don bya bar dga' ba bde bar byed do// des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
283b2('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu gang sems can gang ci snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ste/ de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis
283b3('bum): khongasu chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i rnga ma 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung
283b4('bum): ba'i gtam gri bor du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
283b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu gang sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag ma/ thong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyis rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khongs su/ 
283b6('bum): chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i rtam
283b7('bum): gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i rno ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ 'di lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos to// de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klud kyi bye ma snyed drag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
283b8('bum): gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyis de bzhin du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos stond to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
284a1('bum): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho da
284a2('bum): nub byang dang / 'od dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyis de nyid du 'dzin to// 
284a3('bum): de bzhin nyid du bzung nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i
284a4('bum): bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de sems dkyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i na te// de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sem
284a5('bum): shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos stonang ngo to// sbyin pa'i gtama'i na tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan da shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am
284a6('bum): 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rje su dran te/ sngon gi gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des/ sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
284a7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ sems can sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag par nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i rta
284a8('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
284b1('bum): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos stond to// sbyin
284b2('bum): pa'i gtam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bde ba'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stonang ngo to// de zag pa med pa mngon
284b3('bum): du bya ba'i shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par reg pa des/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gta'/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
284b4('bum): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gdam gi bar du chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
284b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'atshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dres pa de dag gis/ lus ci dang ciyongs su bzung bar 'dod pa dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung
284b6('bum): zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams
284b7('bum): cad byed kyang bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing
284b8('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang / bde ba'am/ sdug bsdug bsngal des phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas te/ dzi nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgu par 'gyur ba dang / sems cad yongasu sbyin par 'gyu
285a2('bum): ba de ltar brtse bar byas te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par ma byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
285a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
285a4('bum): chub med do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gi yan lag yongasu rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
285a5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de gang gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
285a6('bum): 'i lam gi yan lag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gi yan lag ging gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gi yan lag dge ba'i
285a7('bum): chos de dag gang lags bam po// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po skye
285a8('bum): banas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i che/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la yong su gdang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin
285b1('bum): par bya'o// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
285b2('bum): bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / khas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
285b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing shes rab sdom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis shes rab sgom mo/ 'di'i don tu shes skem mo// zhes gsuM po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ shes rab/ 
285b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis/ bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b5('bum): dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par/ 
285b6('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya dang / rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes po rjes dang / ting nge 'dzi/ 
285b7('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs dang / ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod kyang del mi
285b8('bum): rto gcing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'i che/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaM so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 
286a1('bum): 'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'dzin las gi yaH
286a2('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam nges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gi byang chub sems dpa' sa/ 
286a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams// sems can chad med pa de dag de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / lam de yongasu rdzogs par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thos
286a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob dar byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nasasems can rnams kyi don byed do// 
286a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i las/ le'u drug bcu bdun no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso/ 
286a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gang 'di skad du gal te chos 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i
286a7('bum): chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas
286a8('bum): bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad yongasu sbyong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
286b1('bum): ni chos thams skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngom par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
286b2('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na zhugs pa yang gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes
286b3('bum): mi bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgri
286b4('bum): pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab 'byor kyis
286b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi nas stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dgal 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byang gi skye gnas pa'o// 
286b6('bum): 'di ni ga shin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lnga'o// 'di ni mi'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyud pa'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ 
286b7('bum): 'di ni ring sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// zhes bgyi ba'i khyad par dang / rnam par dbye ba ji ltar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmyigs su me
286b8('bum): ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigasu ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmyigasu ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
287a1('bum): de de bzhin te/ ji skad du spras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/ las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
287a2('bum): stong pa la chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ngan par spyad pa 'am/ legs par spyad pa 'am/ mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de ngan par spyad pa'i las kyi ngan song du skye'o// legs par spyad pa'i las
287a3('bum): kyis lha dang / mir skye'o// nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khamasu skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyad
287a4('bum): chul/ khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa da na brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyad
287a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams spyad/ yang dag par spro kha rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rjem
287a6('bum): rang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
287a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzi
287a8('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
287b1('bum): spyad de/ nyams pa med pa'i spyad pas/ byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzi byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par gzhog cing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
287b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don byed do// don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud zos shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi ltung ba de ltar don byed do// gsol
287b3('bum): pabacom ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
287b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma yin no// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan la ngas ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am kor po 'am/ gnas pa dang / dkar ba 'am/ mi gnas cing mi dkar
287b5('bum): ba dmyigs pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de sde ma dmigs na sems dmyal ba'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin
287b6('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lha dang / mir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgya su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ 
287b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos
287b8('bum): rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can 'di dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar
288a1('bum): shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams
288a2('bum): ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams mi 'grol ste/ rab 'byor de sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes// mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/ de ci'i
288a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos thams cad rang gis mtshan nyid kyis stong nas/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
288a4('bum): tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye'o// rnams kyis mngon chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin no// de de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing / 
288a5('bum): sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ skye
288a6('bum): mched rnams med la skye mched du 'du shes/ khams myed pa la khams su 'du shes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 'du shes/ 'jig rten gi chos med pa la 'jig rten gi chos
288a7('bum): su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos myed pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos myed pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i cho su 'du shes/ zag pa myed pa'i chos myed pa la zag/ 
288a8('bum): pa myed pa'i cho su 'du shes 'dus byas kyi chos myong ba la 'dus byas kyi cho su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus ma byas kyi cho su 'du shes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ni log tu gyur pa'i sems / 
288b1('bum): ldan pa rnams lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongasu mi grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha gro lang du phyin par dge ba'i chos thams rba/ 
288b2('bum): 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnaMs
288b3('bum): yongasu 'grelang to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag rabar rdzogs pa'i/ 
288b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgyud da lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongasu 'grelo pal/ dgas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'od la byung
288b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa sa/ nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sa sa rgyas te/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug sngal
288b6('bum): 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to// 'chad do// 'jog go/ 'god do// rno bar 'grel to// gsal bar byed// yang dag par brjod do// 'phags pa bden pa bzhi
288b7('bum): po 'di dge ba'i tshes byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyeng pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnams par bkod pa de thams cad yang su 'dus te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dgen mchog dang / dge 'dun dgos
288b8('bum): mchog gsu ma 'jig rten du 'byung bas sems can rnams rgyad lnga'i 'khor ba las yong su 'grel do// rab 'byor da kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba gyu
289a1('bum): ramate'on te sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung 'tshal bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram
289a2('bum): 'on te/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
289a3('bum): rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal shes pa gis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung shes pas yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung kyis kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gon
289a4('bum): pa shes pas yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ lamadagis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po
289a5('bum): de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs// te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba yin/ sku ga bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung shes pas yongasu
289a6('bum): mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no// kun 'byung ba ma yin no// ku sdug bsngal ba ma yin 'gog pa shes pas yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas ma yin no// lam shes pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da'
289a7('bum): ma yin/ lam gis kyang ma yin no// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog
289a8('bum): pa ya ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal pa yang ma mchis lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal pa yang ma mchis pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyan par nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / de ni 'phags
289b1('bum): pa'i den pa bzhi po dag gi de bzhin nyid dag ma nong pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma nong pa de bzhin nyi dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dge chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa'i dang / yang dag pa'i mthar de bzhin
289b2('bum): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gnas pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyigs mi nyam mi 'grib par 'gug pa ste/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
289b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ji ltar spyod na/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te khong du chud nas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
289b5('bum): sar mi ltung zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
289b6('bum): spyo pa'i chen chos de dag ji nas kyang chos gang yang dmyigasu med pa de ltar/ chos thams cad ma dmyigs pas/ bden par rtog pa'am/ bden pa ma rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des de ltar mthong bas skye
289b7('bum): med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas/ spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
289b8('bum): 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems de rigs kyis de la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi bskubo// chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrung // 
290a1('bum): de lhag mthong gis de gnas shing chos thams cud rab tu shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i den pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do// de sdug bsngal lo su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmyigs pa'i sems mi skyeng ngo // 
290a2('bum): kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung ba smin dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa'i sems mi skyed do// lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do// gzhan du na byang chub
290a3('bum): gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yang dag pa ji bzhin zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
290a4('bum): ba/ stong pa nyid do// gsold pa stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid
290a5('bum): gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
290a6('bum): ma byas/ dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas ma byas/ byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas/ 
290a7('bum): te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis mi shes mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos
290a8('bum): ston to// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u drug cu brgyad pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das/ 
290b1('bum): la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
290b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ chos de dag 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 
290b3('bum): 'di ni byil sos gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di dag ni lha'o// 'di dag ni mi'o// las 'odis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyuraro// 
290b4('bum): lAm 'dis ni mir 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' da ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / 
290b5('bum): tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med
290b6('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni nam mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa/ 
290b7('bum): skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni bya/ 
290b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyu ro// zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/ rnam par dgod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ 
291a1('bum): 1bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnasu mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchis pa 'am// 
291a2('bum): mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'amag sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lhar skye ba'am/ mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs mi dang / tshangs lnga nye na dang // tshangs pa ku/ 
291a3('bum): 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snong dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge ba dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chu che dang dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 
291a4('bum): miche ba dang / mi gagadung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya non snang ba dang / 'og min gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' seyas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes mye
291a5('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ 
291a6('bum): bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thos par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zhes
291a7('bum): bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ 
291a8('bum): dngos po med pa la ni las dang med/ bya ba med pa/ 'bras bu yang med/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye'o 'phags pa'i chos rnams la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis/ chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/ phyin ci log las
291b1('bum): byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten namag mi 'amag rgyal chen bzhi'i
291b2('bum): ris sa kyi lha'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lnga nye phan dang / tshangs pa kur 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / 
291b3('bum): tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / rkye rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba
291b4('bum): dang / 'og min gi lha'am/ nam mkha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po med pa'i
291b5('bum): la ni las sam/ bya ba'am/ 'bras bu med de/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// rab 'byor de de la 'di skad du dngos po med pa la ni bya ba gang yang med de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song
291b6('bum): gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ 
291b7('bum): tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang / dge ba dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu
291b8('bum): ba dang / mchi ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye/ 
292a1('bum): pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
292a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i lam la sbyor ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang med do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
292a3('bum): du sems na lam mngos po med pa ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang rgya byang chub ni mngon po med pa ma
292a4('bum): ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med med pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po// ma mchis pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos ma mchis pa'o// lan cig/ 
292a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa the mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
292a6('bum): stsal pa na rab 'byor de ji sam du sems da/ dngos po med pa'i chos thob par byed snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar dngos po med pa gang yin pa/ 
292a7('bum): dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos gang gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub
292a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes
292b1('bum): gyur pa/ bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du she su gyur pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shesu gyur pa/ dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po med pa las rnam par 'gro lang ngo to// rab 'byor kyis gsolang ngo // bcom ldan/ 
292b2('bum): 'das ci lags/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la gang la dngos po zhes nas/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis na ni mngon par 'dra bgyid par yang/ 
292b3('bum): jiltar 'gyur/ sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ji sa mi 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga phyin ci log ma rdzogs par gang la gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon pa
292b4('bum): 'du byed pa'i dngos po'i chung ngun sra rtse mo'itsho shas bzhag pacam yang myed do// rab 'byor de lta bas na ji nas kyang don 'jigasal zhing rdzogs pa dang / mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod lo dpe bshang don/ garab byen
292b5('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ mi lam du mthong ba la/ rmi lam mthong ba de/ gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta/ bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam nyid
292b6('bum): kyang ma mchis nad rmyi lam mthong ba de la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon ton lngas yongasu spyod pa lnga smos kyang ci 'chal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de snyam du sems/ 'jig rten
292b7('bum): pa'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang mi lam dang / 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsosung ba/ bcom san
292b8('bum): 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu yang ma mchis// 
293a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji rmyi lam lu rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji ste
293a2('bum): du sems/ rmi lam la lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
293a3('bum): 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ brjod pa dang / tshig dang / sgra dang / yi ge thams cad kyis gdag su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du soms/ me long la gzugs
293a4('bum): brnyan snang ba de la/ gang las mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ mi dang lhar 'gro ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol

293a6('bum): cing / mngon par 'du bgyid pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ mi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis
293a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dmanagasol
293a8('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ lam bsgom pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rna por
293b1('bum): byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa lnga smos kyang ci 'chal te/ ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nags lcag po dang / ri dang / tse rong dang / lung ba nas

293b3('bum): ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de dag nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ de la sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyi

293b8('bum): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan gyi lam gang la bsgom pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma/

294a3('bum): klung med pa la chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / grong khyer myed par grong khyer gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / skyed mo tshal myed pa la skyed mo tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'dus byas pas

295a1('bum): dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnasu 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i siras kyi lhar skye ba 'amaH/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang /

295a6('bum): su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'chi ba 'am/ mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /

295a8('bum): tshang med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
